                           </span>

                           </span>

         <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
            <header class="preface-titlepage">
               <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
            </header>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">VINCENTIO, the Duke. </span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ANGELO, Deputy.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ESCALUS, an ancient Lord.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">CLAUDIO, a young gentleman.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">LUCIO, a fantastic.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">Two other gentlemen.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">Provost.</span>
            </p>
            <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
               <tr>
                  <td>
                     <span class="member">
                        <span class="personname">PETER</span>
                        <span class="personname">THOMAS</span>
                     </span>
                  </td>
                  <td>
                     <span class="member">two friars.</span>
                  </td>
               </tr>
            </table>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">A Justice.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">VARRIUS</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ELBOW, a simple constable.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">FROTH, a foolish gentleman.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">POMPEY, servant to Mistress Overdone.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ABHORSON, an executioner.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">BARNARDINE, a dissolute prisoner.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">ISABELLA, sister to Claudio.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">MARIANA, betrothed to Angelo.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">JULIET, beloved of Claudio.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">FRANCISCA, a nun.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">MISTRESS OVERDONE, a bawd.</span>
            </p>
            <p>
               <span class="personname">Lords, Officers, Citizens, Boy, and Attendant.</span>
            </p>
            <p>SCENE  Vienna.</p>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  A Street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A monastery.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.3.5">4. SCENE IV.  A nunnery.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, ESCALUS, Lords and
Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Escalus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Of government the properties to unfold,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would seem in me to affect speech and discourse;</div>
                     <div class="line">Since I am put to know that your own science</div>
                     <div class="line">Exceeds, in that, the lists of all advice</div>
                     <div class="line">My strength can give you: then no more remains,</div>
                     <div class="line">But that to your sufficiency, as your Worth is able,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let them work. The nature of our people,</div>
                     <div class="line">Our city's institutions, and the terms</div>
                     <div class="line">For common justice, you're as pregnant in</div>
                     <div class="line">As art and practise hath enriched any</div>
                     <div class="line">That we remember. There is our commission,</div>
                     <div class="line">From which we would not have you warp. Call hither,</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, bid come before us Angelo.</div>
                     <p>Exit an Attendant</p>
                     <div class="line">What figure of us think you he will bear?</div>
                     <div class="line">For you must know, we have with special soul</div>
                     <div class="line">Elected him our absence to supply,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lent him our terror, dress'd him with our love,</div>
                     <div class="line">And given his deputation all the organs</div>
                     <div class="line">Of our own power: what think you of it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">If any in Vienna be of worth</div>
                     <div class="line">To undergo such ample grace and honour,</div>
                     <div class="line">It is Lord Angelo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look where he comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Always obedient to your grace's will,</div>
                     <div class="line">I come to know your pleasure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Angelo,</div>
                     <div class="line">There is a kind of character in thy life,</div>
                     <div class="line">That to the observer doth thy history</div>
                     <div class="line">Fully unfold. Thyself and thy belongings</div>
                     <div class="line">Are not thine own so proper as to waste</div>
                     <div class="line">Thyself upon thy virtues, they on thee.</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven doth with us as we with torches do,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not light them for themselves; for if our virtues</div>
                     <div class="line">Did not go forth of us, 'twere all alike</div>
                     <div class="line">As if we had them not. Spirits are not finely touch'd</div>
                     <div class="line">But to fine issues, nor Nature never lends</div>
                     <div class="line">The smallest scruple of her excellence</div>
                     <div class="line">But, like a thrifty goddess, she determines</div>
                     <div class="line">Herself the glory of a creditor,</div>
                     <div class="line">Both thanks and use. But I do bend my speech</div>
                     <div class="line">To one that can my part in him advertise;</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold therefore, Angelo:--</div>
                     <div class="line">In our remove be thou at full ourself;</div>
                     <div class="line">Mortality and mercy in Vienna</div>
                     <div class="line">Live in thy tongue and heart: old Escalus,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though first in question, is thy secondary.</div>
                     <div class="line">Take thy commission.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, good my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let there be some more test made of my metal,</div>
                     <div class="line">Before so noble and so great a figure</div>
                     <div class="line">Be stamp'd upon it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No more evasion:</div>
                     <div class="line">We have with a leaven'd and prepared choice</div>
                     <div class="line">Proceeded to you; therefore take your honours.</div>
                     <div class="line">Our haste from hence is of so quick condition</div>
                     <div class="line">That it prefers itself and leaves unquestion'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Matters of needful value. We shall write to you,</div>
                     <div class="line">As time and our concernings shall importune,</div>
                     <div class="line">How it goes with us, and do look to know</div>
                     <div class="line">What doth befall you here. So, fare you well;</div>
                     <div class="line">To the hopeful execution do I leave you</div>
                     <div class="line">Of your commissions.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet give leave, my lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">That we may bring you something on the way.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My haste may not admit it;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor need you, on mine honour, have to do</div>
                     <div class="line">With any scruple; your scope is as mine own</div>
                     <div class="line">So to enforce or qualify the laws</div>
                     <div class="line">As to your soul seems good. Give me your hand:</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll privily away. I love the people,</div>
                     <div class="line">But do not like to stage me to their eyes:</div>
                     <div class="line">Through it do well, I do not relish well</div>
                     <div class="line">Their loud applause and Aves vehement;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor do I think the man of safe discretion</div>
                     <div class="line">That does affect it. Once more, fare you well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">The heavens give safety to your purposes!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Lead forth and bring you back in happiness!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you. Fare you well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall desire you, sir, to give me leave</div>
                     <div class="line">To have free speech with you; and it concerns me</div>
                     <div class="line">To look into the bottom of my place:</div>
                     <div class="line">A power I have, but of what strength and nature</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not yet instructed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis so with me. Let us withdraw together,</div>
                     <div class="line">And we may soon our satisfaction have</div>
                     <div class="line">Touching that point.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll wait upon your honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  A Street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">If the duke with the other dukes come not to</div>
                     <div class="line">composition with the King of Hungary, why then all</div>
                     <div class="line">the dukes fall upon the king.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven grant us its peace, but not the King of</div>
                     <div class="line">Hungary's!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Amen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou concludest like the sanctimonious pirate, that</div>
                     <div class="line">went to sea with the Ten Commandments, but scraped</div>
                     <div class="line">one out of the table.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">'Thou shalt not steal'?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, that he razed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, 'twas a commandment to command the captain and</div>
                     <div class="line">all the rest from their functions: they put forth</div>
                     <div class="line">to steal. There's not a soldier of us all, that, in</div>
                     <div class="line">the thanksgiving before meat, do relish the petition</div>
                     <div class="line">well that prays for peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">I never heard any soldier dislike it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I believe thee; for I think thou never wast where</div>
                     <div class="line">grace was said.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">No? a dozen times at least.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">What, in metre?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">In any proportion or in any language.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">I think, or in any religion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, why not? Grace is grace, despite of all</div>
                     <div class="line">controversy: as, for example, thou thyself art a</div>
                     <div class="line">wicked villain, despite of all grace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, there went but a pair of shears between us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I grant; as there may between the lists and the</div>
                     <div class="line">velvet. Thou art the list.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">And thou the velvet: thou art good velvet; thou'rt</div>
                     <div class="line">a three-piled piece, I warrant thee: I had as lief</div>
                     <div class="line">be a list of an English kersey as be piled, as thou</div>
                     <div class="line">art piled, for a French velvet. Do I speak</div>
                     <div class="line">feelingly now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I think thou dost; and, indeed, with most painful</div>
                     <div class="line">feeling of thy speech: I will, out of thine own</div>
                     <div class="line">confession, learn to begin thy health; but, whilst I</div>
                     <div class="line">live, forget to drink after thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">I think I have done myself wrong, have I not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, that thou hast, whether thou art tainted or free.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold, behold. where Madam Mitigation comes! I</div>
                     <div class="line">have purchased as many diseases under her roof as come to--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">To what, I pray?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Judge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">To three thousand dolours a year.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A French crown more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art always figuring diseases in me; but thou</div>
                     <div class="line">art full of error; I am sound.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, not as one would say, healthy; but so sound as</div>
                     <div class="line">things that are hollow: thy bones are hollow;</div>
                     <div class="line">impiety has made a feast of thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MISTRESS OVERDONE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! which of your hips has the most profound sciatica?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, well; there's one yonder arrested and carried</div>
                     <div class="line">to prison was worth five thousand of you all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's that, I pray thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, that's Claudio, Signior Claudio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Claudio to prison? 'tis not so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, but I know 'tis so: I saw him arrested, saw</div>
                     <div class="line">him carried away; and, which is more, within these</div>
                     <div class="line">three days his head to be chopped off.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But, after all this fooling, I would not have it so.</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou sure of this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">I am too sure of it: and it is for getting Madam</div>
                     <div class="line">Julietta with child.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Believe me, this may be: he promised to meet me two</div>
                     <div class="line">hours since, and he was ever precise in</div>
                     <div class="line">promise-keeping.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Besides, you know, it draws something near to the</div>
                     <div class="line">speech we had to such a purpose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">But, most of all, agreeing with the proclamation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Away! let's go learn the truth of it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt LUCIO and Gentlemen</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus, what with the war, what with the sweat, what</div>
                     <div class="line">with the gallows and what with poverty, I am</div>
                     <div class="line">custom-shrunk.</div>
                     <p>Enter POMPEY</p>
                     <div class="line">How now! what's the news with you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Yonder man is carried to prison.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; what has he done?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">A woman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">But what's his offence?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Groping for trouts in a peculiar river.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is there a maid with child by him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">No, but there's a woman with maid by him. You have</div>
                     <div class="line">not heard of the proclamation, have you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">What proclamation, man?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">All houses in the suburbs of Vienna must be plucked down.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">And what shall become of those in the city?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">They shall stand for seed: they had gone down too,</div>
                     <div class="line">but that a wise burgher put in for them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">But shall all our houses of resort in the suburbs be</div>
                     <div class="line">pulled down?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">To the ground, mistress.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, here's a change indeed in the commonwealth!</div>
                     <div class="line">What shall become of me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Come; fear you not: good counsellors lack no</div>
                     <div class="line">clients: though you change your place, you need not</div>
                     <div class="line">change your trade; I'll be your tapster still.</div>
                     <div class="line">Courage! there will be pity taken on you: you that</div>
                     <div class="line">have worn your eyes almost out in the service, you</div>
                     <div class="line">will be considered.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">What's to do here, Thomas tapster? let's withdraw.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes Signior Claudio, led by the provost to</div>
                     <div class="line">prison; and there's Madam Juliet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
               <p>Enter Provost, CLAUDIO, JULIET, and Officers</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fellow, why dost thou show me thus to the world?</div>
                     <div class="line">Bear me to prison, where I am committed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I do it not in evil disposition,</div>
                     <div class="line">But from Lord Angelo by special charge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus can the demigod Authority</div>
                     <div class="line">Make us pay down for our offence by weight</div>
                     <div class="line">The words of heaven; on whom it will, it will;</div>
                     <div class="line">On whom it will not, so; yet still 'tis just.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now, Claudio! whence comes this restraint?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">From too much liberty, my Lucio, liberty:</div>
                     <div class="line">As surfeit is the father of much fast,</div>
                     <div class="line">So every scope by the immoderate use</div>
                     <div class="line">Turns to restraint. Our natures do pursue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like rats that ravin down their proper bane,</div>
                     <div class="line">A thirsty evil; and when we drink we die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">If could speak so wisely under an arrest, I would</div>
                     <div class="line">send for certain of my creditors: and yet, to say</div>
                     <div class="line">the truth, I had as lief have the foppery of freedom</div>
                     <div class="line">as the morality of imprisonment. What's thy</div>
                     <div class="line">offence, Claudio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What but to speak of would offend again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is't murder?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lechery?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Call it so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, sir! you must go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">One word, good friend. Lucio, a word with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A hundred, if they'll do you any good.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is lechery so look'd after?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus stands it with me: upon a true contract</div>
                     <div class="line">I got possession of Julietta's bed:</div>
                     <div class="line">You know the lady; she is fast my wife,</div>
                     <div class="line">Save that we do the denunciation lack</div>
                     <div class="line">Of outward order: this we came not to,</div>
                     <div class="line">Only for propagation of a dower</div>
                     <div class="line">Remaining in the coffer of her friends,</div>
                     <div class="line">From whom we thought it meet to hide our love</div>
                     <div class="line">Till time had made them for us. But it chances</div>
                     <div class="line">The stealth of our most mutual entertainment</div>
                     <div class="line">With character too gross is writ on Juliet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">With child, perhaps?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Unhappily, even so.</div>
                     <div class="line">And the new deputy now for the duke--</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether it be the fault and glimpse of newness,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or whether that the body public be</div>
                     <div class="line">A horse whereon the governor doth ride,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, newly in the seat, that it may know</div>
                     <div class="line">He can command, lets it straight feel the spur;</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether the tyranny be in his place,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or in his emmence that fills it up,</div>
                     <div class="line">I stagger in:--but this new governor</div>
                     <div class="line">Awakes me all the enrolled penalties</div>
                     <div class="line">Which have, like unscour'd armour, hung by the wall</div>
                     <div class="line">So long that nineteen zodiacs have gone round</div>
                     <div class="line">And none of them been worn; and, for a name,</div>
                     <div class="line">Now puts the drowsy and neglected act</div>
                     <div class="line">Freshly on me: 'tis surely for a name.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I warrant it is: and thy head stands so tickle on</div>
                     <div class="line">thy shoulders that a milkmaid, if she be in love,</div>
                     <div class="line">may sigh it off. Send after the duke and appeal to</div>
                     <div class="line">him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have done so, but he's not to be found.</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, Lucio, do me this kind service:</div>
                     <div class="line">This day my sister should the cloister enter</div>
                     <div class="line">And there receive her approbation:</div>
                     <div class="line">Acquaint her with the danger of my state:</div>
                     <div class="line">Implore her, in my voice, that she make friends</div>
                     <div class="line">To the strict deputy; bid herself assay him:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have great hope in that; for in her youth</div>
                     <div class="line">There is a prone and speechless dialect,</div>
                     <div class="line">Such as move men; beside, she hath prosperous art</div>
                     <div class="line">When she will play with reason and discourse,</div>
                     <div class="line">And well she can persuade.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray she may; as well for the encouragement of the</div>
                     <div class="line">like, which else would stand under grievous</div>
                     <div class="line">imposition, as for the enjoying of thy life, who I</div>
                     <div class="line">would be sorry should be thus foolishly lost at a</div>
                     <div class="line">game of tick-tack. I'll to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you, good friend Lucio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Within two hours.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, officer, away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  A monastery.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO and FRIAR THOMAS</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, holy father; throw away that thought;</div>
                     <div class="line">Believe not that the dribbling dart of love</div>
                     <div class="line">Can pierce a complete bosom. Why I desire thee</div>
                     <div class="line">To give me secret harbour, hath a purpose</div>
                     <div class="line">More grave and wrinkled than the aims and ends</div>
                     <div class="line">Of burning youth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                     <div class="line">May your grace speak of it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My holy sir, none better knows than you</div>
                     <div class="line">How I have ever loved the life removed</div>
                     <div class="line">And held in idle price to haunt assemblies</div>
                     <div class="line">Where youth, and cost, and witless bravery keeps.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have deliver'd to Lord Angelo,</div>
                     <div class="line">A man of stricture and firm abstinence,</div>
                     <div class="line">My absolute power and place here in Vienna,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he supposes me travell'd to Poland;</div>
                     <div class="line">For so I have strew'd it in the common ear,</div>
                     <div class="line">And so it is received. Now, pious sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">You will demand of me why I do this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                     <div class="line">Gladly, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">We have strict statutes and most biting laws.</div>
                     <div class="line">The needful bits and curbs to headstrong weeds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which for this nineteen years we have let slip;</div>
                     <div class="line">Even like an o'ergrown lion in a cave,</div>
                     <div class="line">That goes not out to prey. Now, as fond fathers,</div>
                     <div class="line">Having bound up the threatening twigs of birch,</div>
                     <div class="line">Only to stick it in their children's sight</div>
                     <div class="line">For terror, not to use, in time the rod</div>
                     <div class="line">Becomes more mock'd than fear'd; so our decrees,</div>
                     <div class="line">Dead to infliction, to themselves are dead;</div>
                     <div class="line">And liberty plucks justice by the nose;</div>
                     <div class="line">The baby beats the nurse, and quite athwart</div>
                     <div class="line">Goes all decorum.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                     <div class="line">It rested in your grace</div>
                     <div class="line">To unloose this tied-up justice when you pleased:</div>
                     <div class="line">And it in you more dreadful would have seem'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Than in Lord Angelo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do fear, too dreadful:</div>
                     <div class="line">Sith 'twas my fault to give the people scope,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twould be my tyranny to strike and gall them</div>
                     <div class="line">For what I bid them do: for we bid this be done,</div>
                     <div class="line">When evil deeds have their permissive pass</div>
                     <div class="line">And not the punishment. Therefore indeed, my father,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have on Angelo imposed the office;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who may, in the ambush of my name, strike home,</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet my nature never in the fight</div>
                     <div class="line">To do in slander. And to behold his sway,</div>
                     <div class="line">I will, as 'twere a brother of your order,</div>
                     <div class="line">Visit both prince and people: therefore, I prithee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Supply me with the habit and instruct me</div>
                     <div class="line">How I may formally in person bear me</div>
                     <div class="line">Like a true friar. More reasons for this action</div>
                     <div class="line">At our more leisure shall I render you;</div>
                     <div class="line">Only, this one: Lord Angelo is precise;</div>
                     <div class="line">Stands at a guard with envy; scarce confesses</div>
                     <div class="line">That his blood flows, or that his appetite</div>
                     <div class="line">Is more to bread than stone: hence shall we see,</div>
                     <div class="line">If power change purpose, what our seemers be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.3.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A nunnery.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ISABELLA and FRANCISCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">And have you nuns no farther privileges?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRANCISCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Are not these large enough?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, truly; I speak not as desiring more;</div>
                     <div class="line">But rather wishing a more strict restraint</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the sisterhood, the votarists of Saint Clare.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  Ho! Peace be in this place!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's that which calls?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FRANCISCA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is a man's voice. Gentle Isabella,</div>
                     <div class="line">Turn you the key, and know his business of him;</div>
                     <div class="line">You may, I may not; you are yet unsworn.</div>
                     <div class="line">When you have vow'd, you must not speak with men</div>
                     <div class="line">But in the presence of the prioress:</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, if you speak, you must not show your face,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or, if you show your face, you must not speak.</div>
                     <div class="line">He calls again; I pray you, answer him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace and prosperity! Who is't that calls</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LUCIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hail, virgin, if you be, as those cheek-roses</div>
                     <div class="line">Proclaim you are no less! Can you so stead me</div>
                     <div class="line">As bring me to the sight of Isabella,</div>
                     <div class="line">A novice of this place and the fair sister</div>
                     <div class="line">To her unhappy brother Claudio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why 'her unhappy brother'? let me ask,</div>
                     <div class="line">The rather for I now must make you know</div>
                     <div class="line">I am that Isabella and his sister.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentle and fair, your brother kindly greets you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Not to be weary with you, he's in prison.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Woe me! for what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For that which, if myself might be his judge,</div>
                     <div class="line">He should receive his punishment in thanks:</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath got his friend with child.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, make me not your story.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is true.</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not--though 'tis my familiar sin</div>
                     <div class="line">With maids to seem the lapwing and to jest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Tongue far from heart--play with all virgins so:</div>
                     <div class="line">I hold you as a thing ensky'd and sainted.</div>
                     <div class="line">By your renouncement an immortal spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">And to be talk'd with in sincerity,</div>
                     <div class="line">As with a saint.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">You do blaspheme the good in mocking me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not believe it. Fewness and truth, 'tis thus:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your brother and his lover have embraced:</div>
                     <div class="line">As those that feed grow full, as blossoming time</div>
                     <div class="line">That from the seedness the bare fallow brings</div>
                     <div class="line">To teeming foison, even so her plenteous womb</div>
                     <div class="line">Expresseth his full tilth and husbandry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Some one with child by him? My cousin Juliet?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is she your cousin?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Adoptedly; as school-maids change their names</div>
                     <div class="line">By vain though apt affection.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">She it is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, let him marry her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the point.</div>
                     <div class="line">The duke is very strangely gone from hence;</div>
                     <div class="line">Bore many gentlemen, myself being one,</div>
                     <div class="line">In hand and hope of action: but we do learn</div>
                     <div class="line">By those that know the very nerves of state,</div>
                     <div class="line">His givings-out were of an infinite distance</div>
                     <div class="line">From his true-meant design. Upon his place,</div>
                     <div class="line">And with full line of his authority,</div>
                     <div class="line">Governs Lord Angelo; a man whose blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Is very snow-broth; one who never feels</div>
                     <div class="line">The wanton stings and motions of the sense,</div>
                     <div class="line">But doth rebate and blunt his natural edge</div>
                     <div class="line">With profits of the mind, study and fast.</div>
                     <div class="line">He--to give fear to use and liberty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which have for long run by the hideous law,</div>
                     <div class="line">As mice by lions--hath pick'd out an act,</div>
                     <div class="line">Under whose heavy sense your brother's life</div>
                     <div class="line">Falls into forfeit: he arrests him on it;</div>
                     <div class="line">And follows close the rigour of the statute,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make him an example. All hope is gone,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless you have the grace by your fair prayer</div>
                     <div class="line">To soften Angelo: and that's my pith of business</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twixt you and your poor brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth he so seek his life?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Has censured him</div>
                     <div class="line">Already; and, as I hear, the provost hath</div>
                     <div class="line">A warrant for his execution.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas! what poor ability's in me</div>
                     <div class="line">To do him good?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Assay the power you have.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">My power? Alas, I doubt--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Our doubts are traitors</div>
                     <div class="line">And make us lose the good we oft might win</div>
                     <div class="line">By fearing to attempt. Go to Lord Angelo,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let him learn to know, when maidens sue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Men give like gods; but when they weep and kneel,</div>
                     <div class="line">All their petitions are as freely theirs</div>
                     <div class="line">As they themselves would owe them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll see what I can do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But speedily.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will about it straight;</div>
                     <div class="line">No longer staying but to give the mother</div>
                     <div class="line">Notice of my affair. I humbly thank you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Commend me to my brother: soon at night</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll send him certain word of my success.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I take my leave of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good sir, adieu.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Another room in the same.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in a prison.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ANGELO, ESCALUS, and a Justice, Provost,
Officers, and other Attendants, behind</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">We must not make a scarecrow of the law,</div>
                     <div class="line">Setting it up to fear the birds of prey,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let it keep one shape, till custom make it</div>
                     <div class="line">Their perch and not their terror.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but yet</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us be keen, and rather cut a little,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than fall, and bruise to death. Alas, this gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom I would save, had a most noble father!</div>
                     <div class="line">Let but your honour know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom I believe to be most strait in virtue,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, in the working of your own affections,</div>
                     <div class="line">Had time cohered with place or place with wishing,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or that the resolute acting of your blood</div>
                     <div class="line">Could have attain'd the effect of your own purpose,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whether you had not sometime in your life</div>
                     <div class="line">Err'd in this point which now you censure him,</div>
                     <div class="line">And pull'd the law upon you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis one thing to be tempted, Escalus,</div>
                     <div class="line">Another thing to fall. I not deny,</div>
                     <div class="line">The jury, passing on the prisoner's life,</div>
                     <div class="line">May in the sworn twelve have a thief or two</div>
                     <div class="line">Guiltier than him they try. What's open made to justice,</div>
                     <div class="line">That justice seizes: what know the laws</div>
                     <div class="line">That thieves do pass on thieves? 'Tis very pregnant,</div>
                     <div class="line">The jewel that we find, we stoop and take't</div>
                     <div class="line">Because we see it; but what we do not see</div>
                     <div class="line">We tread upon, and never think of it.</div>
                     <div class="line">You may not so extenuate his offence</div>
                     <div class="line">For I have had such faults; but rather tell me,</div>
                     <div class="line">When I, that censure him, do so offend,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let mine own judgment pattern out my death,</div>
                     <div class="line">And nothing come in partial. Sir, he must die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Be it as your wisdom will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is the provost?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, if it like your honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">See that Claudio</div>
                     <div class="line">Be executed by nine to-morrow morning:</div>
                     <div class="line">Bring him his confessor, let him be prepared;</div>
                     <div class="line">For that's the utmost of his pilgrimage.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  Well, heaven forgive him! and forgive us all!</div>
                     <div class="line">Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall:</div>
                     <div class="line">Some run from brakes of ice, and answer none:</div>
                     <div class="line">And some condemned for a fault alone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ELBOW, and Officers with FROTH and POMPEY</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, bring them away: if these be good people in</div>
                     <div class="line">a commonweal that do nothing but use their abuses in</div>
                     <div class="line">common houses, I know no law: bring them away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, sir! What's your name? and what's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">If it Please your honour, I am the poor duke's</div>
                     <div class="line">constable, and my name is Elbow: I do lean upon</div>
                     <div class="line">justice, sir, and do bring in here before your good</div>
                     <div class="line">honour two notorious benefactors.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Benefactors? Well; what benefactors are they? are</div>
                     <div class="line">they not malefactors?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">If it? please your honour, I know not well what they</div>
                     <div class="line">are: but precise villains they are, that I am sure</div>
                     <div class="line">of; and void of all profanation in the world that</div>
                     <div class="line">good Christians ought to have.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">This comes off well; here's a wise officer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to: what quality are they of? Elbow is your</div>
                     <div class="line">name? why dost thou not speak, Elbow?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">He cannot, sir; he's out at elbow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">What are you, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">He, sir! a tapster, sir; parcel-bawd; one that</div>
                     <div class="line">serves a bad woman; whose house, sir, was, as they</div>
                     <div class="line">say, plucked down in the suburbs; and now she</div>
                     <div class="line">professes a hot-house, which, I think, is a very ill house too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How know you that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">My wife, sir, whom I detest before heaven and your honour,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How? thy wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir; whom, I thank heaven, is an honest woman,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou detest her therefore?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, sir, I will detest myself also, as well as</div>
                     <div class="line">she, that this house, if it be not a bawd's house,</div>
                     <div class="line">it is pity of her life, for it is a naughty house.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How dost thou know that, constable?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
