                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, sir, by my wife; who, if she had been a woman</div>
                     <div class="line">cardinally given, might have been accused in</div>
                     <div class="line">fornication, adultery, and all uncleanliness there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">By the woman's means?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir, by Mistress Overdone's means: but as she</div>
                     <div class="line">spit in his face, so she defied him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, if it please your honour, this is not so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Prove it before these varlets here, thou honourable</div>
                     <div class="line">man; prove it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you hear how he misplaces?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, she came in great with child; and longing,</div>
                     <div class="line">saving your honour's reverence, for stewed prunes;</div>
                     <div class="line">sir, we had but two in the house, which at that very</div>
                     <div class="line">distant time stood, as it were, in a fruit-dish, a</div>
                     <div class="line">dish of some three-pence; your honours have seen</div>
                     <div class="line">such dishes; they are not China dishes, but very</div>
                     <div class="line">good dishes,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to, go to: no matter for the dish, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">No, indeed, sir, not of a pin; you are therein in</div>
                     <div class="line">the right: but to the point. As I say, this</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress Elbow, being, as I say, with child, and</div>
                     <div class="line">being great-bellied, and longing, as I said, for</div>
                     <div class="line">prunes; and having but two in the dish, as I said,</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Froth here, this very man, having eaten the</div>
                     <div class="line">rest, as I said, and, as I say, paying for them very</div>
                     <div class="line">honestly; for, as you know, Master Froth, I could</div>
                     <div class="line">not give you three-pence again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">No, indeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well: you being then, if you be remembered,</div>
                     <div class="line">cracking the stones of the foresaid prunes,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, so I did indeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, very well; I telling you then, if you be</div>
                     <div class="line">remembered, that such a one and such a one were past</div>
                     <div class="line">cure of the thing you wot of, unless they kept very</div>
                     <div class="line">good diet, as I told you,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">All this is true.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, very well, then,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, you are a tedious fool: to the purpose. What</div>
                     <div class="line">was done to Elbow's wife, that he hath cause to</div>
                     <div class="line">complain of? Come me to what was done to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, your honour cannot come to that yet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir, nor I mean it not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, but you shall come to it, by your honour's</div>
                     <div class="line">leave. And, I beseech you, look into Master Froth</div>
                     <div class="line">here, sir; a man of four-score pound a year; whose</div>
                     <div class="line">father died at Hallowmas: was't not at Hallowmas,</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Froth?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">All-hallond eve.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, very well; I hope here be truths. He, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">sitting, as I say, in a lower chair, sir; 'twas in</div>
                     <div class="line">the Bunch of Grapes, where indeed you have a delight</div>
                     <div class="line">to sit, have you not?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">I have so; because it is an open room and good for winter.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, very well, then; I hope here be truths.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">This will last out a night in Russia,</div>
                     <div class="line">When nights are longest there: I'll take my leave.</div>
                     <div class="line">And leave you to the hearing of the cause;</div>
                     <div class="line">Hoping you'll find good cause to whip them all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I think no less. Good morrow to your lordship.</div>
                     <p>Exit ANGELO</p>
                     <div class="line">Now, sir, come on: what was done to Elbow's wife, once more?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Once, sir? there was nothing done to her once.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">I beseech you, sir, ask him what this man did to my wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I beseech your honour, ask me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, sir; what did this gentleman to her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman's face.</div>
                     <div class="line">Good Master Froth, look upon his honour; 'tis for a</div>
                     <div class="line">good purpose. Doth your honour mark his face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir, very well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay; I beseech you, mark it well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I do so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth your honour see any harm in his face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, no.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll be supposed upon a book, his face is the worst</div>
                     <div class="line">thing about him. Good, then; if his face be the</div>
                     <div class="line">worst thing about him, how could Master Froth do the</div>
                     <div class="line">constable's wife any harm? I would know that of</div>
                     <div class="line">your honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">He's in the right. Constable, what say you to it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">First, an it like you, the house is a respected</div>
                     <div class="line">house; next, this is a respected fellow; and his</div>
                     <div class="line">mistress is a respected woman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">By this hand, sir, his wife is a more respected</div>
                     <div class="line">person than any of us all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicked varlet! the</div>
                     <div class="line">time has yet to come that she was ever respected</div>
                     <div class="line">with man, woman, or child.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, she was respected with him before he married with her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is the wiser here? Justice or Iniquity? Is</div>
                     <div class="line">this true?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked</div>
                     <div class="line">Hannibal! I respected with her before I was married</div>
                     <div class="line">to her! If ever I was respected with her, or she</div>
                     <div class="line">with me, let not your worship think me the poor</div>
                     <div class="line">duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll have mine action of battery on thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">If he took you a box o' the ear, you might have your</div>
                     <div class="line">action of slander too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, I thank your good worship for it. What is't</div>
                     <div class="line">your worship's pleasure I shall do with this wicked caitiff?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, officer, because he hath some offences in him</div>
                     <div class="line">that thou wouldst discover if thou couldst, let him</div>
                     <div class="line">continue in his courses till thou knowest what they</div>
                     <div class="line">are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, I thank your worship for it. Thou seest, thou</div>
                     <div class="line">wicked varlet, now, what's come upon thee: thou art</div>
                     <div class="line">to continue now, thou varlet; thou art to continue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Where were you born, friend?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">Here in Vienna, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you of fourscore pounds a year?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, an't please you, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">So. What trade are you of, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPHEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Your mistress' name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPHEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress Overdone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath she had any more than one husband?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Nine, sir; Overdone by the last.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Nine! Come hither to me, Master Froth. Master</div>
                     <div class="line">Froth, I would not have you acquainted with</div>
                     <div class="line">tapsters: they will draw you, Master Froth, and you</div>
                     <div class="line">will hang them. Get you gone, and let me hear no</div>
                     <div class="line">more of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank your worship. For mine own part, I never</div>
                     <div class="line">come into any room in a tap-house, but I am drawn</div>
                     <div class="line">in.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, no more of it, Master Froth: farewell.</div>
                     <p>Exit FROTH</p>
                     <div class="line">Come you hither to me, Master tapster. What's your</div>
                     <div class="line">name, Master tapster?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Pompey.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What else?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Bum, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Troth, and your bum is the greatest thing about you;</div>
                     <div class="line">so that in the beastliest sense you are Pompey the</div>
                     <div class="line">Great. Pompey, you are partly a bawd, Pompey,</div>
                     <div class="line">howsoever you colour it in being a tapster, are you</div>
                     <div class="line">not? come, tell me true: it shall be the better for you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, sir, I am a poor fellow that would live.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">How would you live, Pompey? by being a bawd? What</div>
                     <div class="line">do you think of the trade, Pompey? is it a lawful trade?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">If the law would allow it, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">But the law will not allow it, Pompey; nor it shall</div>
                     <div class="line">not be allowed in Vienna.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Does your worship mean to geld and splay all the</div>
                     <div class="line">youth of the city?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">No, Pompey.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, sir, in my poor opinion, they will to't then.</div>
                     <div class="line">If your worship will take order for the drabs and</div>
                     <div class="line">the knaves, you need not to fear the bawds.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">There are pretty orders beginning, I can tell you:</div>
                     <div class="line">it is but heading and hanging.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">If you head and hang all that offend that way but</div>
                     <div class="line">for ten year together, you'll be glad to give out a</div>
                     <div class="line">commission for more heads: if this law hold in</div>
                     <div class="line">Vienna ten year, I'll rent the fairest house in it</div>
                     <div class="line">after three-pence a bay: if you live to see this</div>
                     <div class="line">come to pass, say Pompey told you so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Thank you, good Pompey; and, in requital of your</div>
                     <div class="line">prophecy, hark you: I advise you, let me not find</div>
                     <div class="line">you before me again upon any complaint whatsoever;</div>
                     <div class="line">no, not for dwelling where you do: if I do, Pompey,</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall beat you to your tent, and prove a shrewd</div>
                     <div class="line">Caesar to you; in plain dealing, Pompey, I shall</div>
                     <div class="line">have you whipt: so, for this time, Pompey, fare you well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank your worship for your good counsel:</div>
                     <p>Aside</p>
                     <div class="line">but I shall follow it as the flesh and fortune shall</div>
                     <div class="line">better determine.</div>
                     <div class="line">Whip me? No, no; let carman whip his jade:</div>
                     <div class="line">The valiant heart is not whipt out of his trade.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither to me, Master Elbow; come hither, Master</div>
                     <div class="line">constable. How long have you been in this place of constable?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Seven year and a half, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought, by your readiness in the office, you had</div>
                     <div class="line">continued in it some time. You say, seven years together?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">And a half, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, it hath been great pains to you. They do you</div>
                     <div class="line">wrong to put you so oft upon 't: are there not men</div>
                     <div class="line">in your ward sufficient to serve it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, sir, few of any wit in such matters: as they</div>
                     <div class="line">are chosen, they are glad to choose me for them; I</div>
                     <div class="line">do it for some piece of money, and go through with</div>
                     <div class="line">all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Look you bring me in the names of some six or seven,</div>
                     <div class="line">the most sufficient of your parish.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                     <div class="line">To your worship's house, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">To my house. Fare you well.</div>
                     <p>Exit ELBOW</p>
                     <div class="line">What's o'clock, think you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Eleven, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you home to dinner with me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">I humbly thank you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">It grieves me for the death of Claudio;</div>
                     <div class="line">But there's no remedy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Lord Angelo is severe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">It is but needful:</div>
                     <div class="line">Mercy is not itself, that oft looks so;</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon is still the nurse of second woe:</div>
                     <div class="line">But yet,--poor Claudio! There is no remedy.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another room in the same.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter Provost and a Servant</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">He's hearing of a cause; he will come straight</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll tell him of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you, do.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">I'll know</div>
                     <div class="line">His pleasure; may be he will relent. Alas,</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath but as offended in a dream!</div>
                     <div class="line">All sects, all ages smack of this vice; and he</div>
                     <div class="line">To die for't!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, what's the matter. Provost?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it your will Claudio shall die tomorrow?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Did not I tell thee yea? hadst thou not order?</div>
                     <div class="line">Why dost thou ask again?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest I might be too rash:</div>
                     <div class="line">Under your good correction, I have seen,</div>
                     <div class="line">When, after execution, judgment hath</div>
                     <div class="line">Repented o'er his doom.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to; let that be mine:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you your office, or give up your place,</div>
                     <div class="line">And you shall well be spared.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I crave your honour's pardon.</div>
                     <div class="line">What shall be done, sir, with the groaning Juliet?</div>
                     <div class="line">She's very near her hour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispose of her</div>
                     <div class="line">To some more fitter place, and that with speed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter Servant</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is the sister of the man condemn'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Desires access to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he a sister?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my good lord; a very virtuous maid,</div>
                     <div class="line">And to be shortly of a sisterhood,</div>
                     <div class="line">If not already.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, let her be admitted.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">See you the fornicatress be removed:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let have needful, but not lavish, means;</div>
                     <div class="line">There shall be order for't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ISABELLA and LUCIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">God save your honour!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stay a little while.</div>
                     <p>To ISABELLA</p>
                     <div class="line">You're welcome: what's your will?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a woeful suitor to your honour,</div>
                     <div class="line">Please but your honour hear me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; what's your suit?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">There is a vice that most I do abhor,</div>
                     <div class="line">And most desire should meet the blow of justice;</div>
                     <div class="line">For which I would not plead, but that I must;</div>
                     <div class="line">For which I must not plead, but that I am</div>
                     <div class="line">At war 'twixt will and will not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a brother is condemn'd to die:</div>
                     <div class="line">I do beseech you, let it be his fault,</div>
                     <div class="line">And not my brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  Heaven give thee moving graces!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Condemn the fault and not the actor of it?</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, every fault's condemn'd ere it be done:</div>
                     <div class="line">Mine were the very cipher of a function,</div>
                     <div class="line">To fine the faults whose fine stands in record,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let go by the actor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">O just but severe law!</div>
                     <div class="line">I had a brother, then. Heaven keep your honour!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Give't not o'er so: to him</div>
                     <div class="line">again, entreat him;</div>
                     <div class="line">Kneel down before him, hang upon his gown:</div>
                     <div class="line">You are too cold; if you should need a pin,</div>
                     <div class="line">You could not with more tame a tongue desire it:</div>
                     <div class="line">To him, I say!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Must he needs die?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Maiden, no remedy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes; I do think that you might pardon him,</div>
                     <div class="line">And neither heaven nor man grieve at the mercy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not do't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">But can you, if you would?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look, what I will not, that I cannot do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">But might you do't, and do the world no wrong,</div>
                     <div class="line">If so your heart were touch'd with that remorse</div>
                     <div class="line">As mine is to him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">He's sentenced; 'tis too late.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  You are too cold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Too late? why, no; I, that do speak a word.</div>
                     <div class="line">May call it back again. Well, believe this,</div>
                     <div class="line">No ceremony that to great ones 'longs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not the king's crown, nor the deputed sword,</div>
                     <div class="line">The marshal's truncheon, nor the judge's robe,</div>
                     <div class="line">Become them with one half so good a grace</div>
                     <div class="line">As mercy does.</div>
                     <div class="line">If he had been as you and you as he,</div>
                     <div class="line">You would have slipt like him; but he, like you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would not have been so stern.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you, be gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I would to heaven I had your potency,</div>
                     <div class="line">And you were Isabel! should it then be thus?</div>
                     <div class="line">No; I would tell what 'twere to be a judge,</div>
                     <div class="line">And what a prisoner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, touch him; there's the vein.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Your brother is a forfeit of the law,</div>
                     <div class="line">And you but waste your words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, alas!</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, all the souls that were were forfeit once;</div>
                     <div class="line">And He that might the vantage best have took</div>
                     <div class="line">Found out the remedy. How would you be,</div>
                     <div class="line">If He, which is the top of judgment, should</div>
                     <div class="line">But judge you as you are? O, think on that;</div>
                     <div class="line">And mercy then will breathe within your lips,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like man new made.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Be you content, fair maid;</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the law, not I condemn your brother:</div>
                     <div class="line">Were he my kinsman, brother, or my son,</div>
                     <div class="line">It should be thus with him: he must die tomorrow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">To-morrow! O, that's sudden! Spare him, spare him!</div>
                     <div class="line">He's not prepared for death. Even for our kitchens</div>
                     <div class="line">We kill the fowl of season: shall we serve heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">With less respect than we do minister</div>
                     <div class="line">To our gross selves? Good, good my lord, bethink you;</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is it that hath died for this offence?</div>
                     <div class="line">There's many have committed it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>           Ay, well said.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">The law hath not been dead, though it hath slept:</div>
                     <div class="line">Those many had not dared to do that evil,</div>
                     <div class="line">If the first that did the edict infringe</div>
                     <div class="line">Had answer'd for his deed: now 'tis awake</div>
                     <div class="line">Takes note of what is done; and, like a prophet,</div>
                     <div class="line">Looks in a glass, that shows what future evils,</div>
                     <div class="line">Either new, or by remissness new-conceived,</div>
                     <div class="line">And so in progress to be hatch'd and born,</div>
                     <div class="line">Are now to have no successive degrees,</div>
                     <div class="line">But, ere they live, to end.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet show some pity.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">I show it most of all when I show justice;</div>
                     <div class="line">For then I pity those I do not know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which a dismiss'd offence would after gall;</div>
                     <div class="line">And do him right that, answering one foul wrong,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lives not to act another. Be satisfied;</div>
                     <div class="line">Your brother dies to-morrow; be content.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">So you must be the first that gives this sentence,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he, that suffer's. O, it is excellent</div>
                     <div class="line">To have a giant's strength; but it is tyrannous</div>
                     <div class="line">To use it like a giant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>   That's well said.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Could great men thunder</div>
                     <div class="line">As Jove himself does, Jove would ne'er be quiet,</div>
                     <div class="line">For every pelting, petty officer</div>
                     <div class="line">Would use his heaven for thunder;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing but thunder! Merciful Heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou rather with thy sharp and sulphurous bolt</div>
                     <div class="line">Split'st the unwedgeable and gnarled oak</div>
                     <div class="line">Than the soft myrtle: but man, proud man,</div>
                     <div class="line">Drest in a little brief authority,</div>
                     <div class="line">Most ignorant of what he's most assured,</div>
                     <div class="line">His glassy essence, like an angry ape,</div>
                     <div class="line">Plays such fantastic tricks before high heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">As make the angels weep; who, with our spleens,</div>
                     <div class="line">Would all themselves laugh mortal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  O, to him, to him, wench! he</div>
                     <div class="line">will relent;</div>
                     <div class="line">He's coming; I perceive 't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  Pray heaven she win him!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">We cannot weigh our brother with ourself:</div>
                     <div class="line">Great men may jest with saints; 'tis wit in them,</div>
                     <div class="line">But in the less foul profanation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou'rt i' the right, girl; more o, that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">That in the captain's but a choleric word,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which in the soldier is flat blasphemy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Art avised o' that? more on 't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why do you put these sayings upon me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Because authority, though it err like others,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath yet a kind of medicine in itself,</div>
                     <div class="line">That skins the vice o' the top. Go to your bosom;</div>
                     <div class="line">Knock there, and ask your heart what it doth know</div>
                     <div class="line">That's like my brother's fault: if it confess</div>
                     <div class="line">A natural guiltiness such as is his,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it not sound a thought upon your tongue</div>
                     <div class="line">Against my brother's life.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>                  She speaks, and 'tis</div>
                     <div class="line">Such sense, that my sense breeds with it. Fare you well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentle my lord, turn back.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will bethink me: come again tomorrow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark how I'll bribe you: good my lord, turn back.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">How! bribe me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, with such gifts that heaven shall share with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  You had marr'd all else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Not with fond shekels of the tested gold,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or stones whose rates are either rich or poor</div>
                     <div class="line">As fancy values them; but with true prayers</div>
                     <div class="line">That shall be up at heaven and enter there</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere sun-rise, prayers from preserved souls,</div>
                     <div class="line">From fasting maids whose minds are dedicate</div>
                     <div class="line">To nothing temporal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; come to me to-morrow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Go to; 'tis well; away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven keep your honour safe!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span> Amen:</div>
                     <div class="line">For I am that way going to temptation,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where prayers cross.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">At what hour to-morrow</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I attend your lordship?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">At any time 'fore noon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Save your honour!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ISABELLA, LUCIO, and Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">From thee, even from thy virtue!</div>
                     <div class="line">What's this, what's this? Is this her fault or mine?</div>
                     <div class="line">The tempter or the tempted, who sins most?</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                     <div class="line">Not she: nor doth she tempt: but it is I</div>
                     <div class="line">That, lying by the violet in the sun,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do as the carrion does, not as the flower,</div>
                     <div class="line">Corrupt with virtuous season. Can it be</div>
                     <div class="line">That modesty may more betray our sense</div>
                     <div class="line">Than woman's lightness? Having waste ground enough,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall we desire to raze the sanctuary</div>
                     <div class="line">And pitch our evils there? O, fie, fie, fie!</div>
                     <div class="line">What dost thou, or what art thou, Angelo?</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou desire her foully for those things</div>
                     <div class="line">That make her good? O, let her brother live!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thieves for their robbery have authority</div>
                     <div class="line">When judges steal themselves. What, do I love her,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I desire to hear her speak again,</div>
                     <div class="line">And feast upon her eyes? What is't I dream on?</div>
                     <div class="line">O cunning enemy, that, to catch a saint,</div>
                     <div class="line">With saints dost bait thy hook! Most dangerous</div>
                     <div class="line">Is that temptation that doth goad us on</div>
                     <div class="line">To sin in loving virtue: never could the strumpet,</div>
                     <div class="line">With all her double vigour, art and nature,</div>
                     <div class="line">Once stir my temper; but this virtuous maid</div>
                     <div class="line">Subdues me quite. Even till now,</div>
                     <div class="line">When men were fond, I smiled and wonder'd how.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in a prison.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter, severally, DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as a
friar, and Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hail to you, provost! so I think you are.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I am the provost. What's your will, good friar?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Bound by my charity and my blest order,</div>
                     <div class="line">I come to visit the afflicted spirits</div>
                     <div class="line">Here in the prison. Do me the common right</div>
                     <div class="line">To let me see them and to make me know</div>
                     <div class="line">The nature of their crimes, that I may minister</div>
                     <div class="line">To them accordingly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I would do more than that, if more were needful.</div>
                     <p>Enter JULIET</p>
                     <div class="line">Look, here comes one: a gentlewoman of mine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, falling in the flaws of her own youth,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath blister'd her report: she is with child;</div>
                     <div class="line">And he that got it, sentenced; a young man</div>
                     <div class="line">More fit to do another such offence</div>
                     <div class="line">Than die for this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">When must he die?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">As I do think, to-morrow.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have provided for you: stay awhile,</div>
                     <p>To JULIET</p>
                     <div class="line">And you shall be conducted.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Repent you, fair one, of the sin you carry?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">I do; and bear the shame most patiently.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll teach you how you shall arraign your conscience,</div>
                     <div class="line">And try your penitence, if it be sound,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or hollowly put on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll gladly learn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Love you the man that wrong'd you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, as I love the woman that wrong'd him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">So then it seems your most offenceful act</div>
                     <div class="line">Was mutually committed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">Mutually.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then was your sin of heavier kind than his.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">I do confess it, and repent it, father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis meet so, daughter: but lest you do repent,</div>
                     <div class="line">As that the sin hath brought you to this shame,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which sorrow is always towards ourselves, not heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">Showing we would not spare heaven as we love it,</div>
                     <div class="line">But as we stand in fear,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">I do repent me, as it is an evil,</div>
                     <div class="line">And take the shame with joy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">There rest.</div>
                     <div class="line">Your partner, as I hear, must die to-morrow,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I am going with instruction to him.</div>
                     <div class="line">Grace go with you, Benedicite!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                     <div class="line">Must die to-morrow! O injurious love,</div>
                     <div class="line">That respites me a life, whose very comfort</div>
                     <div class="line">Is still a dying horror!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis pity of him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">When I would pray and think, I think and pray</div>
                     <div class="line">To several subjects. Heaven hath my empty words;</div>
                     <div class="line">Whilst my invention, hearing not my tongue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Anchors on Isabel: Heaven in my mouth,</div>
                     <div class="line">As if I did but only chew his name;</div>
                     <div class="line">And in my heart the strong and swelling evil</div>
                     <div class="line">Of my conception. The state, whereon I studied</div>
                     <div class="line">Is like a good thing, being often read,</div>
                     <div class="line">Grown fear'd and tedious; yea, my gravity,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein--let no man hear me--I take pride,</div>
                     <div class="line">Could I with boot change for an idle plume,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which the air beats for vain. O place, O form,</div>
                     <div class="line">How often dost thou with thy case, thy habit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Wrench awe from fools and tie the wiser souls</div>
                     <div class="line">To thy false seeming! Blood, thou art blood:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's write good angel on the devil's horn:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis not the devil's crest.</div>
                     <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">How now! who's there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                     <div class="line">One Isabel, a sister, desires access to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Teach her the way.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">O heavens!</div>
                     <div class="line">Why does my blood thus muster to my heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">Making both it unable for itself,</div>
                     <div class="line">And dispossessing all my other parts</div>
                     <div class="line">Of necessary fitness?</div>
                     <div class="line">So play the foolish throngs with one that swoons;</div>
                     <div class="line">Come all to help him, and so stop the air</div>
                     <div class="line">By which he should revive: and even so</div>
                     <div class="line">The general, subject to a well-wish'd king,</div>
                     <div class="line">Quit their own part, and in obsequious fondness</div>
                     <div class="line">Crowd to his presence, where their untaught love</div>
                     <div class="line">Must needs appear offence.</div>
                     <p>Enter ISABELLA</p>
                     <div class="line">How now, fair maid?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am come to know your pleasure.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">That you might know it, would much better please me</div>
                     <div class="line">Than to demand what 'tis. Your brother cannot live.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Even so. Heaven keep your honour!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet may he live awhile; and, it may be,</div>
                     <div class="line">As long as you or I yet he must die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Under your sentence?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">When, I beseech you? that in his reprieve,</div>
                     <div class="line">Longer or shorter, he may be so fitted</div>
                     <div class="line">That his soul sicken not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
