                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, I prithee, might be the cause?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, pardon; 'tis a secret must be locked within the</div>
                     <div class="line">teeth and the lips: but this I can let you</div>
                     <div class="line">understand, the greater file of the subject held the</div>
                     <div class="line">duke to be wise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Wise! why, no question but he was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A very superficial, ignorant, unweighing fellow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Either this is the envy in you, folly, or mistaking:</div>
                     <div class="line">the very stream of his life and the business he hath</div>
                     <div class="line">helmed must upon a warranted need give him a better</div>
                     <div class="line">proclamation. Let him be but testimonied in his own</div>
                     <div class="line">bringings-forth, and he shall appear to the</div>
                     <div class="line">envious a scholar, a statesman and a soldier.</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore you speak unskilfully: or if your</div>
                     <div class="line">knowledge be more it is much darkened in your malice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I know him, and I love him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Love talks with better knowledge, and knowledge with</div>
                     <div class="line">dearer love.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, sir, I know what I know.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I can hardly believe that, since you know not what</div>
                     <div class="line">you speak. But, if ever the duke return, as our</div>
                     <div class="line">prayers are he may, let me desire you to make your</div>
                     <div class="line">answer before him. If it be honest you have spoke,</div>
                     <div class="line">you have courage to maintain it: I am bound to call</div>
                     <div class="line">upon you; and, I pray you, your name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, my name is Lucio; well known to the duke.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He shall know you better, sir, if I may live to</div>
                     <div class="line">report you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I fear you not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, you hope the duke will return no more; or you</div>
                     <div class="line">imagine me too unhurtful an opposite. But indeed I</div>
                     <div class="line">can do you little harm; you'll forswear this again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll be hanged first: thou art deceived in me,</div>
                     <div class="line">friar. But no more of this. Canst thou tell if</div>
                     <div class="line">Claudio die to-morrow or no?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why should he die, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why? For filling a bottle with a tundish. I would</div>
                     <div class="line">the duke we talk of were returned again: the</div>
                     <div class="line">ungenitured agent will unpeople the province with</div>
                     <div class="line">continency; sparrows must not build in his</div>
                     <div class="line">house-eaves, because they are lecherous. The duke</div>
                     <div class="line">yet would have dark deeds darkly answered; he would</div>
                     <div class="line">never bring them to light: would he were returned!</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, this Claudio is condemned for untrussing.</div>
                     <div class="line">Farewell, good friar: I prithee, pray for me. The</div>
                     <div class="line">duke, I say to thee again, would eat mutton on</div>
                     <div class="line">Fridays. He's not past it yet, and I say to thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">he would mouth with a beggar, though she smelt brown</div>
                     <div class="line">bread and garlic: say that I said so. Farewell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No might nor greatness in mortality</div>
                     <div class="line">Can censure 'scape; back-wounding calumny</div>
                     <div class="line">The whitest virtue strikes. What king so strong</div>
                     <div class="line">Can tie the gall up in the slanderous tongue?</div>
                     <div class="line">But who comes here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ESCALUS, Provost, and Officers with MISTRESS OVERDONE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Go; away with her to prison!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">Good my lord, be good to me; your honour is accounted</div>
                     <div class="line">a merciful man; good my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Double and treble admonition, and still forfeit in</div>
                     <div class="line">the same kind! This would make mercy swear and play</div>
                     <div class="line">the tyrant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">A bawd of eleven years' continuance, may it please</div>
                     <div class="line">your honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, this is one Lucio's information against me.</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress Kate Keepdown was with child by him in the</div>
                     <div class="line">duke's time; he promised her marriage: his child</div>
                     <div class="line">is a year and a quarter old, come Philip and Jacob:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have kept it myself; and see how he goes about to abuse me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">That fellow is a fellow of much licence: let him be</div>
                     <div class="line">called before us. Away with her to prison! Go to;</div>
                     <div class="line">no more words.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt Officers with MISTRESS OVERDONE</p>
                     <div class="line">Provost, my brother Angelo will not be altered;</div>
                     <div class="line">Claudio must die to-morrow: let him be furnished</div>
                     <div class="line">with divines, and have all charitable preparation.</div>
                     <div class="line">if my brother wrought by my pity, it should not be</div>
                     <div class="line">so with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">So please you, this friar hath been with him, and</div>
                     <div class="line">advised him for the entertainment of death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Good even, good father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Bliss and goodness on you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Of whence are you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not of this country, though my chance is now</div>
                     <div class="line">To use it for my time: I am a brother</div>
                     <div class="line">Of gracious order, late come from the See</div>
                     <div class="line">In special business from his holiness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">What news abroad i' the world?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">None, but that there is so great a fever on</div>
                     <div class="line">goodness, that the dissolution of it must cure it:</div>
                     <div class="line">novelty is only in request; and it is as dangerous</div>
                     <div class="line">to be aged in any kind of course, as it is virtuous</div>
                     <div class="line">to be constant in any undertaking. There is scarce</div>
                     <div class="line">truth enough alive to make societies secure; but</div>
                     <div class="line">security enough to make fellowships accurst: much</div>
                     <div class="line">upon this riddle runs the wisdom of the world. This</div>
                     <div class="line">news is old enough, yet it is every day's news. I</div>
                     <div class="line">pray you, sir, of what disposition was the duke?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">One that, above all other strifes, contended</div>
                     <div class="line">especially to know himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What pleasure was he given to?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">Rather rejoicing to see another merry, than merry at</div>
                     <div class="line">any thing which professed to make him rejoice: a</div>
                     <div class="line">gentleman of all temperance. But leave we him to</div>
                     <div class="line">his events, with a prayer they may prove prosperous;</div>
                     <div class="line">and let me desire to know how you find Claudio</div>
                     <div class="line">prepared. I am made to understand that you have</div>
                     <div class="line">lent him visitation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He professes to have received no sinister measure</div>
                     <div class="line">from his judge, but most willingly humbles himself</div>
                     <div class="line">to the determination of justice: yet had he framed</div>
                     <div class="line">to himself, by the instruction of his frailty, many</div>
                     <div class="line">deceiving promises of life; which I by my good</div>
                     <div class="line">leisure have discredited to him, and now is he</div>
                     <div class="line">resolved to die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">You have paid the heavens your function, and the</div>
                     <div class="line">prisoner the very debt of your calling. I have</div>
                     <div class="line">laboured for the poor gentleman to the extremest</div>
                     <div class="line">shore of my modesty: but my brother justice have I</div>
                     <div class="line">found so severe, that he hath forced me to tell him</div>
                     <div class="line">he is indeed Justice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">If his own life answer the straitness of his</div>
                     <div class="line">proceeding, it shall become him well; wherein if he</div>
                     <div class="line">chance to fail, he hath sentenced himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I am going to visit the prisoner. Fare you well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace be with you!</div>
                     <p>Exeunt ESCALUS and Provost</p>
                     <div class="line">He who the sword of heaven will bear</div>
                     <div class="line">Should be as holy as severe;</div>
                     <div class="line">Pattern in himself to know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Grace to stand, and virtue go;</div>
                     <div class="line">More nor less to others paying</div>
                     <div class="line">Than by self-offences weighing.</div>
                     <div class="line">Shame to him whose cruel striking</div>
                     <div class="line">Kills for faults of his own liking!</div>
                     <div class="line">Twice treble shame on Angelo,</div>
                     <div class="line">To weed my vice and let his grow!</div>
                     <div class="line">O, what may man within him hide,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though angel on the outward side!</div>
                     <div class="line">How may likeness made in crimes,</div>
                     <div class="line">Making practise on the times,</div>
                     <div class="line">To draw with idle spiders' strings</div>
                     <div class="line">Most ponderous and substantial things!</div>
                     <div class="line">Craft against vice I must apply:</div>
                     <div class="line">With Angelo to-night shall lie</div>
                     <div class="line">His old betrothed but despised;</div>
                     <div class="line">So disguise shall, by the disguised,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pay with falsehood false exacting,</div>
                     <div class="line">And perform an old contracting.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  The moated grange at ST. LUKE's.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the prison.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  Another room in the same.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.6">5. SCENE V.  Fields without the town.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.7">6. SCENE VI.  Street near the city gate.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  The moated grange at ST. LUKE's.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MARIANA and a Boy</p>
               <p>Boy sings</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker"/>
                     <div class="line">Take, O, take those lips away,</div>
                     <div class="line">That so sweetly were forsworn;</div>
                     <div class="line">And those eyes, the break of day,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lights that do mislead the morn:</div>
                     <div class="line">But my kisses bring again, bring again;</div>
                     <div class="line">Seals of love, but sealed in vain, sealed in vain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Break off thy song, and haste thee quick away:</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes a man of comfort, whose advice</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath often still'd my brawling discontent.</div>
                     <p>Exit Boy</p>
                     <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before</p>
                     <div class="line">I cry you mercy, sir; and well could wish</div>
                     <div class="line">You had not found me here so musical:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me excuse me, and believe me so,</div>
                     <div class="line">My mirth it much displeased, but pleased my woe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis good; though music oft hath such a charm</div>
                     <div class="line">To make bad good, and good provoke to harm.</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray, you, tell me, hath any body inquired</div>
                     <div class="line">for me here to-day? much upon this time have</div>
                     <div class="line">I promised here to meet.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">You have not been inquired after:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have sat here all day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ISABELLA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do constantly believe you. The time is come even</div>
                     <div class="line">now. I shall crave your forbearance a little: may</div>
                     <div class="line">be I will call upon you anon, for some advantage to yourself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am always bound to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well met, and well come.</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the news from this good deputy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath a garden circummured with brick,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose western side is with a vineyard back'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">And to that vineyard is a planched gate,</div>
                     <div class="line">That makes his opening with this bigger key:</div>
                     <div class="line">This other doth command a little door</div>
                     <div class="line">Which from the vineyard to the garden leads;</div>
                     <div class="line">There have I made my promise</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the heavy middle of the night</div>
                     <div class="line">To call upon him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But shall you on your knowledge find this way?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have ta'en a due and wary note upon't:</div>
                     <div class="line">With whispering and most guilty diligence,</div>
                     <div class="line">In action all of precept, he did show me</div>
                     <div class="line">The way twice o'er.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are there no other tokens</div>
                     <div class="line">Between you 'greed concerning her observance?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, none, but only a repair i' the dark;</div>
                     <div class="line">And that I have possess'd him my most stay</div>
                     <div class="line">Can be but brief; for I have made him know</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a servant comes with me along,</div>
                     <div class="line">That stays upon me, whose persuasion is</div>
                     <div class="line">I come about my brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well borne up.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have not yet made known to Mariana</div>
                     <div class="line">A word of this. What, ho! within! come forth!</div>
                     <p>Re-enter MARIANA</p>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, be acquainted with this maid;</div>
                     <div class="line">She comes to do you good.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I do desire the like.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you persuade yourself that I respect you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good friar, I know you do, and have found it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Take, then, this your companion by the hand,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who hath a story ready for your ear.</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall attend your leisure: but make haste;</div>
                     <div class="line">The vaporous night approaches.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Will't please you walk aside?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt MARIANA and ISABELLA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O place and greatness! millions of false eyes</div>
                     <div class="line">Are stuck upon thee: volumes of report</div>
                     <div class="line">Run with these false and most contrarious quests</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon thy doings: thousand escapes of wit</div>
                     <div class="line">Make thee the father of their idle dreams</div>
                     <div class="line">And rack thee in their fancies.</div>
                     <p>Re-enter MARIANA and ISABELLA</p>
                     <div class="line">Welcome, how agreed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">She'll take the enterprise upon her, father,</div>
                     <div class="line">If you advise it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is not my consent,</div>
                     <div class="line">But my entreaty too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Little have you to say</div>
                     <div class="line">When you depart from him, but, soft and low,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Remember now my brother.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear me not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor, gentle daughter, fear you not at all.</div>
                     <div class="line">He is your husband on a pre-contract:</div>
                     <div class="line">To bring you thus together, 'tis no sin,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sith that the justice of your title to him</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth flourish the deceit. Come, let us go:</div>
                     <div class="line">Our corn's to reap, for yet our tithe's to sow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the prison.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter Provost and POMPEY</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, sirrah. Can you cut off a man's head?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">If the man be a bachelor, sir, I can; but if he be a</div>
                     <div class="line">married man, he's his wife's head, and I can never</div>
                     <div class="line">cut off a woman's head.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, sir, leave me your snatches, and yield me a</div>
                     <div class="line">direct answer. To-morrow morning are to die Claudio</div>
                     <div class="line">and Barnardine. Here is in our prison a common</div>
                     <div class="line">executioner, who in his office lacks a helper: if</div>
                     <div class="line">you will take it on you to assist him, it shall</div>
                     <div class="line">redeem you from your gyves; if not, you shall have</div>
                     <div class="line">your full time of imprisonment and your deliverance</div>
                     <div class="line">with an unpitied whipping, for you have been a</div>
                     <div class="line">notorious bawd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I have been an unlawful bawd time out of mind;</div>
                     <div class="line">but yet I will be content to be a lawful hangman. I</div>
                     <div class="line">would be glad to receive some instruction from my</div>
                     <div class="line">fellow partner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">What, ho! Abhorson! Where's Abhorson, there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ABHORSON</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you call, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, here's a fellow will help you to-morrow in</div>
                     <div class="line">your execution. If you think it meet, compound with</div>
                     <div class="line">him by the year, and let him abide here with you; if</div>
                     <div class="line">not, use him for the present and dismiss him. He</div>
                     <div class="line">cannot plead his estimation with you; he hath been a bawd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">A bawd, sir? fie upon him! he will discredit our mystery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to, sir; you weigh equally; a feather will turn</div>
                     <div class="line">the scale.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, sir, by your good favour,--for surely, sir, a</div>
                     <div class="line">good favour you have, but that you have a hanging</div>
                     <div class="line">look,--do you call, sir, your occupation a mystery?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir; a mystery</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Painting, sir, I have heard say, is a mystery; and</div>
                     <div class="line">your whores, sir, being members of my occupation,</div>
                     <div class="line">using painting, do prove my occupation a mystery:</div>
                     <div class="line">but what mystery there should be in hanging, if I</div>
                     <div class="line">should be hanged, I cannot imagine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, it is a mystery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Proof?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Every true man's apparel fits your thief: if it be</div>
                     <div class="line">too little for your thief, your true man thinks it</div>
                     <div class="line">big enough; if it be too big for your thief, your</div>
                     <div class="line">thief thinks it little enough: so every true man's</div>
                     <div class="line">apparel fits your thief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you agreed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I will serve him; for I do find your hangman is</div>
                     <div class="line">a more penitent trade than your bawd; he doth</div>
                     <div class="line">oftener ask forgiveness.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">You, sirrah, provide your block and your axe</div>
                     <div class="line">to-morrow four o'clock.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on, bawd; I will instruct thee in my trade; follow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I do desire to learn, sir: and I hope, if you have</div>
                     <div class="line">occasion to use me for your own turn, you shall find</div>
                     <div class="line">me yare; for truly, sir, for your kindness I owe you</div>
                     <div class="line">a good turn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Call hither Barnardine and Claudio:</div>
                     <p>Exeunt POMPEY and ABHORSON</p>
                     <div class="line">The one has my pity; not a jot the other,</div>
                     <div class="line">Being a murderer, though he were my brother.</div>
                     <p>Enter CLAUDIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Look, here's the warrant, Claudio, for thy death:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis now dead midnight, and by eight to-morrow</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou must be made immortal. Where's Barnardine?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                     <div class="line">As fast lock'd up in sleep as guiltless labour</div>
                     <div class="line">When it lies starkly in the traveller's bones:</div>
                     <div class="line">He will not wake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Who can do good on him?</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, go, prepare yourself.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">But, hark, what noise?</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven give your spirits comfort!</div>
                     <p>Exit CLAUDIO</p>
                     <div class="line">By and by.</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope it is some pardon or reprieve</div>
                     <div class="line">For the most gentle Claudio.</div>
                     <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before</p>
                     <div class="line">Welcome father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The best and wholesomest spirts of the night</div>
                     <div class="line">Envelope you, good Provost! Who call'd here of late?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">None, since the curfew rung.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not Isabel?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">They will, then, ere't be long.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">What comfort is for Claudio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">There's some in hope.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">It is a bitter deputy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not so, not so; his life is parallel'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Even with the stroke and line of his great justice:</div>
                     <div class="line">He doth with holy abstinence subdue</div>
                     <div class="line">That in himself which he spurs on his power</div>
                     <div class="line">To qualify in others: were he meal'd with that</div>
                     <div class="line">Which he corrects, then were he tyrannous;</div>
                     <div class="line">But this being so, he's just.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">Now are they come.</div>
                     <p>Exit Provost</p>
                     <div class="line">This is a gentle provost: seldom when</div>
                     <div class="line">The steeled gaoler is the friend of men.</div>
                     <p>Knocking within</p>
                     <div class="line">How now! what noise? That spirit's possessed with haste</div>
                     <div class="line">That wounds the unsisting postern with these strokes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">There he must stay until the officer</div>
                     <div class="line">Arise to let him in: he is call'd up.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Have you no countermand for Claudio yet,</div>
                     <div class="line">But he must die to-morrow?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">None, sir, none.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">As near the dawning, provost, as it is,</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall hear more ere morning.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Happily</div>
                     <div class="line">You something know; yet I believe there comes</div>
                     <div class="line">No countermand; no such example have we:</div>
                     <div class="line">Besides, upon the very siege of justice</div>
                     <div class="line">Lord Angelo hath to the public ear</div>
                     <div class="line">Profess'd the contrary.</div>
                     <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                     <div class="line">This is his lordship's man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And here comes Claudio's pardon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Giving a paper</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">My lord hath sent you this note; and by me this</div>
                     <div class="line">further charge, that you swerve not from the</div>
                     <div class="line">smallest article of it, neither in time, matter, or</div>
                     <div class="line">other circumstance. Good morrow; for, as I take it,</div>
                     <div class="line">it is almost day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I shall obey him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Messenger</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Aside</span>  This is his pardon, purchased by such sin</div>
                     <div class="line">For which the pardoner himself is in.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hence hath offence his quick celerity,</div>
                     <div class="line">When it is born in high authority:</div>
                     <div class="line">When vice makes mercy, mercy's so extended,</div>
                     <div class="line">That for the fault's love is the offender friended.</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, sir, what news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I told you. Lord Angelo, belike thinking me remiss</div>
                     <div class="line">in mine office, awakens me with this unwonted</div>
                     <div class="line">putting-on; methinks strangely, for he hath not used it before.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray you, let's hear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">'Whatsoever you may hear to the contrary, let</div>
                     <div class="line">Claudio be executed by four of the clock; and in the</div>
                     <div class="line">afternoon Barnardine: for my better satisfaction,</div>
                     <div class="line">let me have Claudio's head sent me by five. Let</div>
                     <div class="line">this be duly performed; with a thought that more</div>
                     <div class="line">depends on it than we must yet deliver. Thus fail</div>
                     <div class="line">not to do your office, as you will answer it at your peril.'</div>
                     <div class="line">What say you to this, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is that Barnardine who is to be executed in the</div>
                     <div class="line">afternoon?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">A Bohemian born, but here nursed un and bred; one</div>
                     <div class="line">that is a prisoner nine years old.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How came it that the absent duke had not either</div>
                     <div class="line">delivered him to his liberty or executed him? I</div>
                     <div class="line">have heard it was ever his manner to do so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">His friends still wrought reprieves for him: and,</div>
                     <div class="line">indeed, his fact, till now in the government of Lord</div>
                     <div class="line">Angelo, came not to an undoubtful proof.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is now apparent?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Most manifest, and not denied by himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he born himself penitently in prison? how</div>
                     <div class="line">seems he to be touched?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">A man that apprehends death no more dreadfully but</div>
                     <div class="line">as a drunken sleep; careless, reckless, and fearless</div>
                     <div class="line">of what's past, present, or to come; insensible of</div>
                     <div class="line">mortality, and desperately mortal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He wants advice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">He will hear none: he hath evermore had the liberty</div>
                     <div class="line">of the prison; give him leave to escape hence, he</div>
                     <div class="line">would not: drunk many times a day, if not many days</div>
                     <div class="line">entirely drunk. We have very oft awaked him, as if</div>
                     <div class="line">to carry him to execution, and showed him a seeming</div>
                     <div class="line">warrant for it: it hath not moved him at all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">More of him anon. There is written in your brow,</div>
                     <div class="line">provost, honesty and constancy: if I read it not</div>
                     <div class="line">truly, my ancient skill beguiles me; but, in the</div>
                     <div class="line">boldness of my cunning, I will lay myself in hazard.</div>
                     <div class="line">Claudio, whom here you have warrant to execute, is</div>
                     <div class="line">no greater forfeit to the law than Angelo who hath</div>
                     <div class="line">sentenced him. To make you understand this in a</div>
                     <div class="line">manifested effect, I crave but four days' respite;</div>
                     <div class="line">for the which you are to do me both a present and a</div>
                     <div class="line">dangerous courtesy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, sir, in what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">In the delaying death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">A lack, how may I do it, having the hour limited,</div>
                     <div class="line">and an express command, under penalty, to deliver</div>
                     <div class="line">his head in the view of Angelo? I may make my case</div>
                     <div class="line">as Claudio's, to cross this in the smallest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">By the vow of mine order I warrant you, if my</div>
                     <div class="line">instructions may be your guide. Let this Barnardine</div>
                     <div class="line">be this morning executed, and his head born to Angelo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Angelo hath seen them both, and will discover the favour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, death's a great disguiser; and you may add to it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Shave the head, and tie the beard; and say it was</div>
                     <div class="line">the desire of the penitent to be so bared before his</div>
                     <div class="line">death: you know the course is common. If any thing</div>
                     <div class="line">fall to you upon this, more than thanks and good</div>
                     <div class="line">fortune, by the saint whom I profess, I will plead</div>
                     <div class="line">against it with my life.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, good father; it is against my oath.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Were you sworn to the duke, or to the deputy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">To him, and to his substitutes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You will think you have made no offence, if the duke</div>
                     <div class="line">avouch the justice of your dealing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">But what likelihood is in that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not a resemblance, but a certainty. Yet since I see</div>
                     <div class="line">you fearful, that neither my coat, integrity, nor</div>
                     <div class="line">persuasion can with ease attempt you, I will go</div>
                     <div class="line">further than I meant, to pluck all fears out of you.</div>
                     <div class="line">Look you, sir, here is the hand and seal of the</div>
                     <div class="line">duke: you know the character, I doubt not; and the</div>
                     <div class="line">signet is not strange to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I know them both.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The contents of this is the return of the duke: you</div>
                     <div class="line">shall anon over-read it at your pleasure; where you</div>
                     <div class="line">shall find, within these two days he will be here.</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a thing that Angelo knows not; for he this</div>
                     <div class="line">very day receives letters of strange tenor;</div>
                     <div class="line">perchance of the duke's death; perchance entering</div>
                     <div class="line">into some monastery; but, by chance, nothing of what</div>
                     <div class="line">is writ. Look, the unfolding star calls up the</div>
                     <div class="line">shepherd. Put not yourself into amazement how these</div>
                     <div class="line">things should be: all difficulties are but easy</div>
                     <div class="line">when they are known. Call your executioner, and off</div>
                     <div class="line">with Barnardine's head: I will give him a present</div>
                     <div class="line">shrift and advise him for a better place. Yet you</div>
                     <div class="line">are amazed; but this shall absolutely resolve you.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come away; it is almost clear dawn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Another room in the same.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter POMPEY</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">I am as well acquainted here as I was in our house</div>
                     <div class="line">of profession: one would think it were Mistress</div>
                     <div class="line">Overdone's own house, for here be many of her old</div>
                     <div class="line">customers. First, here's young Master Rash; he's in</div>
                     <div class="line">for a commodity of brown paper and old ginger,</div>
                     <div class="line">ninescore and seventeen pounds; of which he made</div>
                     <div class="line">five marks, ready money: marry, then ginger was not</div>
                     <div class="line">much in request, for the old women were all dead.</div>
                     <div class="line">Then is there here one Master Caper, at the suit of</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Three-pile the mercer, for some four suits of</div>
                     <div class="line">peach-coloured satin, which now peaches him a</div>
                     <div class="line">beggar. Then have we here young Dizy, and young</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Deep-vow, and Master Copperspur, and Master</div>
                     <div class="line">Starve-lackey the rapier and dagger man, and young</div>
                     <div class="line">Drop-heir that killed lusty Pudding, and Master</div>
                     <div class="line">Forthlight the tilter, and brave Master Shooty the</div>
                     <div class="line">great traveller, and wild Half-can that stabbed</div>
                     <div class="line">Pots, and, I think, forty more; all great doers in</div>
                     <div class="line">our trade, and are now 'for the Lord's sake.'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter ABHORSON</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, bring Barnardine hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Barnardine! you must rise and be hanged.</div>
                     <div class="line">Master Barnardine!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">What, ho, Barnardine!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  A pox o' your throats! Who makes that</div>
                     <div class="line">noise there? What are you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Your friends, sir; the hangman. You must be so</div>
                     <div class="line">good, sir, to rise and be put to death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  Away, you rogue, away! I am sleepy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell him he must awake, and that quickly too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till you are</div>
                     <div class="line">executed, and sleep afterwards.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Go in to him, and fetch him out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">He is coming, sir, he is coming; I hear his straw rustle.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Is the axe upon the block, sirrah?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">Very ready, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter BARNARDINE</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, Abhorson? what's the news with you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, sir, I would desire you to clap into your</div>
                     <div class="line">prayers; for, look you, the warrant's come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">You rogue, I have been drinking all night; I am not</div>
                     <div class="line">fitted for 't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                     <div class="line">O, the better, sir; for he that drinks all night,</div>
                     <div class="line">and is hanged betimes in the morning, may sleep the</div>
                     <div class="line">sounder all the next day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ABHORSON</div>
                     <div class="line">Look you, sir; here comes your ghostly father: do</div>
                     <div class="line">we jest now, think you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, induced by my charity, and hearing how hastily</div>
                     <div class="line">you are to depart, I am come to advise you, comfort</div>
                     <div class="line">you and pray with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Friar, not I I have been drinking hard all night,</div>
                     <div class="line">and I will have more time to prepare me, or they</div>
                     <div class="line">shall beat out my brains with billets: I will not</div>
                     <div class="line">consent to die this day, that's certain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir, you must: and therefore I beseech you</div>
                     <div class="line">Look forward on the journey you shall go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">I swear I will not die to-day for any man's</div>
                     <div class="line">persuasion.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But hear you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BARNARDINE</div>
                     <div class="line">Not a word: if you have any thing to say to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">come to my ward; for thence will not I to-day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Unfit to live or die: O gravel heart!</div>
                     <div class="line">After him, fellows; bring him to the block.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ABHORSON and POMPEY</p>
               <p>Re-enter Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, sir, how do you find the prisoner?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A creature unprepared, unmeet for death;</div>
                     <div class="line">And to transport him in the mind he is</div>
                     <div class="line">Were damnable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Here in the prison, father,</div>
                     <div class="line">There died this morning of a cruel fever</div>
                     <div class="line">One Ragozine, a most notorious pirate,</div>
                     <div class="line">A man of Claudio's years; his beard and head</div>
                     <div class="line">Just of his colour. What if we do omit</div>
                     <div class="line">This reprobate till he were well inclined;</div>
                     <div class="line">And satisfy the deputy with the visage</div>
                     <div class="line">Of Ragozine, more like to Claudio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'tis an accident that heaven provides!</div>
                     <div class="line">Dispatch it presently; the hour draws on</div>
                     <div class="line">Prefix'd by Angelo: see this be done,</div>
                     <div class="line">And sent according to command; whiles I</div>
                     <div class="line">Persuade this rude wretch willingly to die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">This shall be done, good father, presently.</div>
                     <div class="line">But Barnardine must die this afternoon:</div>
                     <div class="line">And how shall we continue Claudio,</div>
                     <div class="line">To save me from the danger that might come</div>
                     <div class="line">If he were known alive?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Let this be done.</div>
                     <div class="line">Put them in secret holds, both Barnardine and Claudio:</div>
                     <div class="line">Ere twice the sun hath made his journal greeting</div>
                     <div class="line">To the under generation, you shall find</div>
                     <div class="line">Your safety manifested.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">I am your free dependant.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
