                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This may prove worse than hanging.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To ESCALUS</span>  What you have spoke I pardon: sit you down:</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll borrow place of him.</div>
                     <p>To ANGELO</p>
                     <div class="line">Sir, by your leave.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou or word, or wit, or impudence,</div>
                     <div class="line">That yet can do thee office? If thou hast,</div>
                     <div class="line">Rely upon it till my tale be heard,</div>
                     <div class="line">And hold no longer out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">O my dread lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">I should be guiltier than my guiltiness,</div>
                     <div class="line">To think I can be undiscernible,</div>
                     <div class="line">When I perceive your grace, like power divine,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath look'd upon my passes. Then, good prince,</div>
                     <div class="line">No longer session hold upon my shame,</div>
                     <div class="line">But let my trial be mine own confession:</div>
                     <div class="line">Immediate sentence then and sequent death</div>
                     <div class="line">Is all the grace I beg.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, Mariana.</div>
                     <div class="line">Say, wast thou e'er contracted to this woman?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">I was, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go take her hence, and marry her instantly.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you the office, friar; which consummate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Return him here again. Go with him, provost.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER and Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I am more amazed at his dishonour</div>
                     <div class="line">Than at the strangeness of it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, Isabel.</div>
                     <div class="line">Your friar is now your prince: as I was then</div>
                     <div class="line">Advertising and holy to your business,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not changing heart with habit, I am still</div>
                     <div class="line">Attorney'd at your service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, give me pardon,</div>
                     <div class="line">That I, your vassal, have employ'd and pain'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Your unknown sovereignty!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You are pardon'd, Isabel:</div>
                     <div class="line">And now, dear maid, be you as free to us.</div>
                     <div class="line">Your brother's death, I know, sits at your heart;</div>
                     <div class="line">And you may marvel why I obscured myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">Labouring to save his life, and would not rather</div>
                     <div class="line">Make rash remonstrance of my hidden power</div>
                     <div class="line">Than let him so be lost. O most kind maid,</div>
                     <div class="line">It was the swift celerity of his death,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I did think with slower foot came on,</div>
                     <div class="line">That brain'd my purpose. But, peace be with him!</div>
                     <div class="line">That life is better life, past fearing death,</div>
                     <div class="line">Than that which lives to fear: make it your comfort,</div>
                     <div class="line">So happy is your brother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">I do, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter ANGELO, MARIANA, FRIAR PETER, and Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For this new-married man approaching here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose salt imagination yet hath wrong'd</div>
                     <div class="line">Your well defended honour, you must pardon</div>
                     <div class="line">For Mariana's sake: but as he adjudged your brother,--</div>
                     <div class="line">Being criminal, in double violation</div>
                     <div class="line">Of sacred chastity and of promise-breach</div>
                     <div class="line">Thereon dependent, for your brother's life,--</div>
                     <div class="line">The very mercy of the law cries out</div>
                     <div class="line">Most audible, even from his proper tongue,</div>
                     <div class="line">'An Angelo for Claudio, death for death!'</div>
                     <div class="line">Haste still pays haste, and leisure answers leisure;</div>
                     <div class="line">Like doth quit like, and MEASURE still FOR MEASURE.</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, Angelo, thy fault's thus manifested;</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, though thou wouldst deny, denies thee vantage.</div>
                     <div class="line">We do condemn thee to the very block</div>
                     <div class="line">Where Claudio stoop'd to death, and with like haste.</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with him!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">O my most gracious lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope you will not mock me with a husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is your husband mock'd you with a husband.</div>
                     <div class="line">Consenting to the safeguard of your honour,</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought your marriage fit; else imputation,</div>
                     <div class="line">For that he knew you, might reproach your life</div>
                     <div class="line">And choke your good to come; for his possessions,</div>
                     <div class="line">Although by confiscation they are ours,</div>
                     <div class="line">We do instate and widow you withal,</div>
                     <div class="line">To buy you a better husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">O my dear lord,</div>
                     <div class="line">I crave no other, nor no better man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Never crave him; we are definitive.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentle my liege,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Kneeling</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You do but lose your labour.</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with him to death!</div>
                     <p>To LUCIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Now, sir, to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">O my good lord! Sweet Isabel, take my part;</div>
                     <div class="line">Lend me your knees, and all my life to come</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll lend you all my life to do you service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Against all sense you do importune her:</div>
                     <div class="line">Should she kneel down in mercy of this fact,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her brother's ghost his paved bed would break,</div>
                     <div class="line">And take her hence in horror.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Isabel,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet Isabel, do yet but kneel by me;</div>
                     <div class="line">Hold up your hands, say nothing; I'll speak all.</div>
                     <div class="line">They say, best men are moulded out of faults;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, for the most, become much more the better</div>
                     <div class="line">For being a little bad: so may my husband.</div>
                     <div class="line">O Isabel, will you not lend a knee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">He dies for Claudio's death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                     <div class="line">Most bounteous sir,</div>
                     <p>Kneeling</p>
                     <div class="line">Look, if it please you, on this man condemn'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">As if my brother lived: I partly think</div>
                     <div class="line">A due sincerity govern'd his deeds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till he did look on me: since it is so,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let him not die. My brother had but justice,</div>
                     <div class="line">In that he did the thing for which he died:</div>
                     <div class="line">For Angelo,</div>
                     <div class="line">His act did not o'ertake his bad intent,</div>
                     <div class="line">And must be buried but as an intent</div>
                     <div class="line">That perish'd by the way: thoughts are no subjects;</div>
                     <div class="line">Intents but merely thoughts.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                     <div class="line">Merely, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Your suit's unprofitable; stand up, I say.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have bethought me of another fault.</div>
                     <div class="line">Provost, how came it Claudio was beheaded</div>
                     <div class="line">At an unusual hour?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">It was commanded so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Had you a special warrant for the deed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">No, my good lord; it was by private message.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For which I do discharge you of your office:</div>
                     <div class="line">Give up your keys.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, noble lord:</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought it was a fault, but knew it not;</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet did repent me, after more advice;</div>
                     <div class="line">For testimony whereof, one in the prison,</div>
                     <div class="line">That should by private order else have died,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have reserved alive.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's he?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">His name is Barnardine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I would thou hadst done so by Claudio.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go fetch him hither; let me look upon him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit Provost</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry, one so learned and so wise</div>
                     <div class="line">As you, Lord Angelo, have still appear'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Should slip so grossly, both in the heat of blood.</div>
                     <div class="line">And lack of temper'd judgment afterward.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry that such sorrow I procure:</div>
                     <div class="line">And so deep sticks it in my penitent heart</div>
                     <div class="line">That I crave death more willingly than mercy;</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis my deserving, and I do entreat it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter Provost, with BARNARDINE, CLAUDIO muffled,
and JULIET</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Which is that Barnardine?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">This, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">There was a friar told me of this man.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, thou art said to have a stubborn soul.</div>
                     <div class="line">That apprehends no further than this world,</div>
                     <div class="line">And squarest thy life according. Thou'rt condemn'd:</div>
                     <div class="line">But, for those earthly faults, I quit them all;</div>
                     <div class="line">And pray thee take this mercy to provide</div>
                     <div class="line">For better times to come. Friar, advise him;</div>
                     <div class="line">I leave him to your hand. What muffled fellow's that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                     <div class="line">This is another prisoner that I saved.</div>
                     <div class="line">Who should have died when Claudio lost his head;</div>
                     <div class="line">As like almost to Claudio as himself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Unmuffles CLAUDIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To ISABELLA</span>  If he be like your brother, for his sake</div>
                     <div class="line">Is he pardon'd; and, for your lovely sake,</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me your hand and say you will be mine.</div>
                     <div class="line">He is my brother too: but fitter time for that.</div>
                     <div class="line">By this Lord Angelo perceives he's safe;</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks I see a quickening in his eye.</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, Angelo, your evil quits you well:</div>
                     <div class="line">Look that you love your wife; her worth worth yours.</div>
                     <div class="line">I find an apt remission in myself;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet here's one in place I cannot pardon.</div>
                     <p>To LUCIO</p>
                     <div class="line">You, sirrah, that knew me for a fool, a coward,</div>
                     <div class="line">One all of luxury, an ass, a madman;</div>
                     <div class="line">Wherein have I so deserved of you,</div>
                     <div class="line">That you extol me thus?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, my lord. I spoke it but according to the</div>
                     <div class="line">trick. If you will hang me for it, you may; but I</div>
                     <div class="line">had rather it would please you I might be whipt.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Whipt first, sir, and hanged after.</div>
                     <div class="line">Proclaim it, provost, round about the city.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is any woman wrong'd by this lewd fellow,</div>
                     <div class="line">As I have heard him swear himself there's one</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom he begot with child, let her appear,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he shall marry her: the nuptial finish'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let him be whipt and hang'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I beseech your highness, do not marry me to a whore.</div>
                     <div class="line">Your highness said even now, I made you a duke:</div>
                     <div class="line">good my lord, do not recompense me in making me a cuckold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon mine honour, thou shalt marry her.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy slanders I forgive; and therewithal</div>
                     <div class="line">Remit thy other forfeits. Take him to prison;</div>
                     <div class="line">And see our pleasure herein executed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Marrying a punk, my lord, is pressing to death,</div>
                     <div class="line">whipping, and hanging.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Slandering a prince deserves it.</div>
                     <p>Exit Officers with LUCIO</p>
                     <div class="line">She, Claudio, that you wrong'd, look you restore.</div>
                     <div class="line">Joy to you, Mariana! Love her, Angelo:</div>
                     <div class="line">I have confess'd her and I know her virtue.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks, good friend Escalus, for thy much goodness:</div>
                     <div class="line">There's more behind that is more gratulate.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thanks, provost, for thy care and secrecy:</div>
                     <div class="line">We shill employ thee in a worthier place.</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgive him, Angelo, that brought you home</div>
                     <div class="line">The head of Ragozine for Claudio's:</div>
                     <div class="line">The offence pardons itself. Dear Isabel,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a motion much imports your good;</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereto if you'll a willing ear incline,</div>
                     <div class="line">What's mine is yours and what is yours is mine.</div>
                     <div class="line">So, bring us to our palace; where we'll show</div>
                     <div class="line">What's yet behind, that's meet you all should know.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>
<html>
   <head>
      <link href="../../resources/css/db-prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/publishers.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <meta charset="utf-8"/>
      <meta content="DocBook XSL 2.0 Stylesheets Vxxx" name="generator"/>
      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>Measure for Measure</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>Measure for Measure</h1>
         </header>

                           </span>

                           </span>

                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.7">5. ACT V</a>

         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">VINCENTIO, the Duke. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ANGELO, Deputy.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ESCALUS, an ancient Lord.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">CLAUDIO, a young gentleman.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LUCIO, a fantastic.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Two other gentlemen.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Provost.</span>
                  </p>
                  <table border="0" class="simplelist" summary="Simple list">
                     <tr>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">
                              <span class="personname">PETER</span>
                              <span class="personname">THOMAS</span>
                           </span>
                        </td>
                        <td>
                           <span class="member">two friars.</span>
                        </td>
                     </tr>
                  </table>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">A Justice.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">VARRIUS</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ELBOW, a simple constable.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">FROTH, a foolish gentleman.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">POMPEY, servant to Mistress Overdone.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ABHORSON, an executioner.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">BARNARDINE, a dissolute prisoner.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">ISABELLA, sister to Claudio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MARIANA, betrothed to Angelo.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">JULIET, beloved of Claudio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">FRANCISCA, a nun.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MISTRESS OVERDONE, a bawd.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Lords, Officers, Citizens, Boy, and Attendant.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  Vienna.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  A Street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A monastery.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.5">4. SCENE IV.  A nunnery.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  An apartment in the DUKE'S palace.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, ESCALUS, Lords and
Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Escalus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of government the properties to unfold,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would seem in me to affect speech and discourse;</div>
                              <div class="line">Since I am put to know that your own science</div>
                              <div class="line">Exceeds, in that, the lists of all advice</div>
                              <div class="line">My strength can give you: then no more remains,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that to your sufficiency, as your Worth is able,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let them work. The nature of our people,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our city's institutions, and the terms</div>
                              <div class="line">For common justice, you're as pregnant in</div>
                              <div class="line">As art and practise hath enriched any</div>
                              <div class="line">That we remember. There is our commission,</div>
                              <div class="line">From which we would not have you warp. Call hither,</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, bid come before us Angelo.</div>
                              <p>Exit an Attendant</p>
                              <div class="line">What figure of us think you he will bear?</div>
                              <div class="line">For you must know, we have with special soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Elected him our absence to supply,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lent him our terror, dress'd him with our love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And given his deputation all the organs</div>
                              <div class="line">Of our own power: what think you of it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If any in Vienna be of worth</div>
                              <div class="line">To undergo such ample grace and honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is Lord Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look where he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Always obedient to your grace's will,</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to know your pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a kind of character in thy life,</div>
                              <div class="line">That to the observer doth thy history</div>
                              <div class="line">Fully unfold. Thyself and thy belongings</div>
                              <div class="line">Are not thine own so proper as to waste</div>
                              <div class="line">Thyself upon thy virtues, they on thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven doth with us as we with torches do,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not light them for themselves; for if our virtues</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not go forth of us, 'twere all alike</div>
                              <div class="line">As if we had them not. Spirits are not finely touch'd</div>
                              <div class="line">But to fine issues, nor Nature never lends</div>
                              <div class="line">The smallest scruple of her excellence</div>
                              <div class="line">But, like a thrifty goddess, she determines</div>
                              <div class="line">Herself the glory of a creditor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both thanks and use. But I do bend my speech</div>
                              <div class="line">To one that can my part in him advertise;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold therefore, Angelo:--</div>
                              <div class="line">In our remove be thou at full ourself;</div>
                              <div class="line">Mortality and mercy in Vienna</div>
                              <div class="line">Live in thy tongue and heart: old Escalus,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though first in question, is thy secondary.</div>
                              <div class="line">Take thy commission.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let there be some more test made of my metal,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before so noble and so great a figure</div>
                              <div class="line">Be stamp'd upon it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No more evasion:</div>
                              <div class="line">We have with a leaven'd and prepared choice</div>
                              <div class="line">Proceeded to you; therefore take your honours.</div>
                              <div class="line">Our haste from hence is of so quick condition</div>
                              <div class="line">That it prefers itself and leaves unquestion'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Matters of needful value. We shall write to you,</div>
                              <div class="line">As time and our concernings shall importune,</div>
                              <div class="line">How it goes with us, and do look to know</div>
                              <div class="line">What doth befall you here. So, fare you well;</div>
                              <div class="line">To the hopeful execution do I leave you</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your commissions.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet give leave, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we may bring you something on the way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My haste may not admit it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor need you, on mine honour, have to do</div>
                              <div class="line">With any scruple; your scope is as mine own</div>
                              <div class="line">So to enforce or qualify the laws</div>
                              <div class="line">As to your soul seems good. Give me your hand:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll privily away. I love the people,</div>
                              <div class="line">But do not like to stage me to their eyes:</div>
                              <div class="line">Through it do well, I do not relish well</div>
                              <div class="line">Their loud applause and Aves vehement;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor do I think the man of safe discretion</div>
                              <div class="line">That does affect it. Once more, fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">The heavens give safety to your purposes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead forth and bring you back in happiness!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall desire you, sir, to give me leave</div>
                              <div class="line">To have free speech with you; and it concerns me</div>
                              <div class="line">To look into the bottom of my place:</div>
                              <div class="line">A power I have, but of what strength and nature</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not yet instructed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis so with me. Let us withdraw together,</div>
                              <div class="line">And we may soon our satisfaction have</div>
                              <div class="line">Touching that point.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll wait upon your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A Street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If the duke with the other dukes come not to</div>
                              <div class="line">composition with the King of Hungary, why then all</div>
                              <div class="line">the dukes fall upon the king.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven grant us its peace, but not the King of</div>
                              <div class="line">Hungary's!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou concludest like the sanctimonious pirate, that</div>
                              <div class="line">went to sea with the Ten Commandments, but scraped</div>
                              <div class="line">one out of the table.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Thou shalt not steal'?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, that he razed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, 'twas a commandment to command the captain and</div>
                              <div class="line">all the rest from their functions: they put forth</div>
                              <div class="line">to steal. There's not a soldier of us all, that, in</div>
                              <div class="line">the thanksgiving before meat, do relish the petition</div>
                              <div class="line">well that prays for peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I never heard any soldier dislike it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I believe thee; for I think thou never wast where</div>
                              <div class="line">grace was said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">No? a dozen times at least.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">What, in metre?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">In any proportion or in any language.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I think, or in any religion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, why not? Grace is grace, despite of all</div>
                              <div class="line">controversy: as, for example, thou thyself art a</div>
                              <div class="line">wicked villain, despite of all grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, there went but a pair of shears between us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I grant; as there may between the lists and the</div>
                              <div class="line">velvet. Thou art the list.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou the velvet: thou art good velvet; thou'rt</div>
                              <div class="line">a three-piled piece, I warrant thee: I had as lief</div>
                              <div class="line">be a list of an English kersey as be piled, as thou</div>
                              <div class="line">art piled, for a French velvet. Do I speak</div>
                              <div class="line">feelingly now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think thou dost; and, indeed, with most painful</div>
                              <div class="line">feeling of thy speech: I will, out of thine own</div>
                              <div class="line">confession, learn to begin thy health; but, whilst I</div>
                              <div class="line">live, forget to drink after thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I think I have done myself wrong, have I not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, that thou hast, whether thou art tainted or free.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold, behold. where Madam Mitigation comes! I</div>
                              <div class="line">have purchased as many diseases under her roof as come to--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">To what, I pray?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Judge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">To three thousand dolours a year.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A French crown more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art always figuring diseases in me; but thou</div>
                              <div class="line">art full of error; I am sound.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, not as one would say, healthy; but so sound as</div>
                              <div class="line">things that are hollow: thy bones are hollow;</div>
                              <div class="line">impiety has made a feast of thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MISTRESS OVERDONE</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! which of your hips has the most profound sciatica?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, well; there's one yonder arrested and carried</div>
                              <div class="line">to prison was worth five thousand of you all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's that, I pray thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, that's Claudio, Signior Claudio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Claudio to prison? 'tis not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but I know 'tis so: I saw him arrested, saw</div>
                              <div class="line">him carried away; and, which is more, within these</div>
                              <div class="line">three days his head to be chopped off.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But, after all this fooling, I would not have it so.</div>
                              <div class="line">Art thou sure of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">I am too sure of it: and it is for getting Madam</div>
                              <div class="line">Julietta with child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, this may be: he promised to meet me two</div>
                              <div class="line">hours since, and he was ever precise in</div>
                              <div class="line">promise-keeping.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, you know, it draws something near to the</div>
                              <div class="line">speech we had to such a purpose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">But, most of all, agreeing with the proclamation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! let's go learn the truth of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt LUCIO and Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus, what with the war, what with the sweat, what</div>
                              <div class="line">with the gallows and what with poverty, I am</div>
                              <div class="line">custom-shrunk.</div>
                              <p>Enter POMPEY</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! what's the news with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Yonder man is carried to prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; what has he done?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">A woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">But what's his offence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Groping for trouts in a peculiar river.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">What, is there a maid with child by him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">No, but there's a woman with maid by him. You have</div>
                              <div class="line">not heard of the proclamation, have you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">What proclamation, man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">All houses in the suburbs of Vienna must be plucked down.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">And what shall become of those in the city?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">They shall stand for seed: they had gone down too,</div>
                              <div class="line">but that a wise burgher put in for them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">But shall all our houses of resort in the suburbs be</div>
                              <div class="line">pulled down?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">To the ground, mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, here's a change indeed in the commonwealth!</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall become of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Come; fear you not: good counsellors lack no</div>
                              <div class="line">clients: though you change your place, you need not</div>
                              <div class="line">change your trade; I'll be your tapster still.</div>
                              <div class="line">Courage! there will be pity taken on you: you that</div>
                              <div class="line">have worn your eyes almost out in the service, you</div>
                              <div class="line">will be considered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MISTRESS OVERDONE</div>
                              <div class="line">What's to do here, Thomas tapster? let's withdraw.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Signior Claudio, led by the provost to</div>
                              <div class="line">prison; and there's Madam Juliet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <p>Enter Provost, CLAUDIO, JULIET, and Officers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fellow, why dost thou show me thus to the world?</div>
                              <div class="line">Bear me to prison, where I am committed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">I do it not in evil disposition,</div>
                              <div class="line">But from Lord Angelo by special charge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus can the demigod Authority</div>
                              <div class="line">Make us pay down for our offence by weight</div>
                              <div class="line">The words of heaven; on whom it will, it will;</div>
                              <div class="line">On whom it will not, so; yet still 'tis just.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter LUCIO and two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, Claudio! whence comes this restraint?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">From too much liberty, my Lucio, liberty:</div>
                              <div class="line">As surfeit is the father of much fast,</div>
                              <div class="line">So every scope by the immoderate use</div>
                              <div class="line">Turns to restraint. Our natures do pursue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like rats that ravin down their proper bane,</div>
                              <div class="line">A thirsty evil; and when we drink we die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If could speak so wisely under an arrest, I would</div>
                              <div class="line">send for certain of my creditors: and yet, to say</div>
                              <div class="line">the truth, I had as lief have the foppery of freedom</div>
                              <div class="line">as the morality of imprisonment. What's thy</div>
                              <div class="line">offence, Claudio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What but to speak of would offend again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, is't murder?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lechery?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Call it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, sir! you must go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">One word, good friend. Lucio, a word with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A hundred, if they'll do you any good.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is lechery so look'd after?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus stands it with me: upon a true contract</div>
                              <div class="line">I got possession of Julietta's bed:</div>
                              <div class="line">You know the lady; she is fast my wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save that we do the denunciation lack</div>
                              <div class="line">Of outward order: this we came not to,</div>
                              <div class="line">Only for propagation of a dower</div>
                              <div class="line">Remaining in the coffer of her friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">From whom we thought it meet to hide our love</div>
                              <div class="line">Till time had made them for us. But it chances</div>
                              <div class="line">The stealth of our most mutual entertainment</div>
                              <div class="line">With character too gross is writ on Juliet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">With child, perhaps?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Unhappily, even so.</div>
                              <div class="line">And the new deputy now for the duke--</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether it be the fault and glimpse of newness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or whether that the body public be</div>
                              <div class="line">A horse whereon the governor doth ride,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, newly in the seat, that it may know</div>
                              <div class="line">He can command, lets it straight feel the spur;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether the tyranny be in his place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or in his emmence that fills it up,</div>
                              <div class="line">I stagger in:--but this new governor</div>
                              <div class="line">Awakes me all the enrolled penalties</div>
                              <div class="line">Which have, like unscour'd armour, hung by the wall</div>
                              <div class="line">So long that nineteen zodiacs have gone round</div>
                              <div class="line">And none of them been worn; and, for a name,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now puts the drowsy and neglected act</div>
                              <div class="line">Freshly on me: 'tis surely for a name.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant it is: and thy head stands so tickle on</div>
                              <div class="line">thy shoulders that a milkmaid, if she be in love,</div>
                              <div class="line">may sigh it off. Send after the duke and appeal to</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have done so, but he's not to be found.</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, Lucio, do me this kind service:</div>
                              <div class="line">This day my sister should the cloister enter</div>
                              <div class="line">And there receive her approbation:</div>
                              <div class="line">Acquaint her with the danger of my state:</div>
                              <div class="line">Implore her, in my voice, that she make friends</div>
                              <div class="line">To the strict deputy; bid herself assay him:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have great hope in that; for in her youth</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a prone and speechless dialect,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as move men; beside, she hath prosperous art</div>
                              <div class="line">When she will play with reason and discourse,</div>
                              <div class="line">And well she can persuade.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray she may; as well for the encouragement of the</div>
                              <div class="line">like, which else would stand under grievous</div>
                              <div class="line">imposition, as for the enjoying of thy life, who I</div>
                              <div class="line">would be sorry should be thus foolishly lost at a</div>
                              <div class="line">game of tick-tack. I'll to her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, good friend Lucio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
