                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Within two hours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, officer, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A monastery.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO and FRIAR THOMAS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, holy father; throw away that thought;</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe not that the dribbling dart of love</div>
                              <div class="line">Can pierce a complete bosom. Why I desire thee</div>
                              <div class="line">To give me secret harbour, hath a purpose</div>
                              <div class="line">More grave and wrinkled than the aims and ends</div>
                              <div class="line">Of burning youth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                              <div class="line">May your grace speak of it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My holy sir, none better knows than you</div>
                              <div class="line">How I have ever loved the life removed</div>
                              <div class="line">And held in idle price to haunt assemblies</div>
                              <div class="line">Where youth, and cost, and witless bravery keeps.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have deliver'd to Lord Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">A man of stricture and firm abstinence,</div>
                              <div class="line">My absolute power and place here in Vienna,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he supposes me travell'd to Poland;</div>
                              <div class="line">For so I have strew'd it in the common ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so it is received. Now, pious sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">You will demand of me why I do this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                              <div class="line">Gladly, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We have strict statutes and most biting laws.</div>
                              <div class="line">The needful bits and curbs to headstrong weeds,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which for this nineteen years we have let slip;</div>
                              <div class="line">Even like an o'ergrown lion in a cave,</div>
                              <div class="line">That goes not out to prey. Now, as fond fathers,</div>
                              <div class="line">Having bound up the threatening twigs of birch,</div>
                              <div class="line">Only to stick it in their children's sight</div>
                              <div class="line">For terror, not to use, in time the rod</div>
                              <div class="line">Becomes more mock'd than fear'd; so our decrees,</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead to infliction, to themselves are dead;</div>
                              <div class="line">And liberty plucks justice by the nose;</div>
                              <div class="line">The baby beats the nurse, and quite athwart</div>
                              <div class="line">Goes all decorum.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR THOMAS</div>
                              <div class="line">It rested in your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">To unloose this tied-up justice when you pleased:</div>
                              <div class="line">And it in you more dreadful would have seem'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Than in Lord Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do fear, too dreadful:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sith 'twas my fault to give the people scope,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twould be my tyranny to strike and gall them</div>
                              <div class="line">For what I bid them do: for we bid this be done,</div>
                              <div class="line">When evil deeds have their permissive pass</div>
                              <div class="line">And not the punishment. Therefore indeed, my father,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have on Angelo imposed the office;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who may, in the ambush of my name, strike home,</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet my nature never in the fight</div>
                              <div class="line">To do in slander. And to behold his sway,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, as 'twere a brother of your order,</div>
                              <div class="line">Visit both prince and people: therefore, I prithee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Supply me with the habit and instruct me</div>
                              <div class="line">How I may formally in person bear me</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a true friar. More reasons for this action</div>
                              <div class="line">At our more leisure shall I render you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Only, this one: Lord Angelo is precise;</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands at a guard with envy; scarce confesses</div>
                              <div class="line">That his blood flows, or that his appetite</div>
                              <div class="line">Is more to bread than stone: hence shall we see,</div>
                              <div class="line">If power change purpose, what our seemers be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A nunnery.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ISABELLA and FRANCISCA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">And have you nuns no farther privileges?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCISCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Are not these large enough?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, truly; I speak not as desiring more;</div>
                              <div class="line">But rather wishing a more strict restraint</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon the sisterhood, the votarists of Saint Clare.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Ho! Peace be in this place!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's that which calls?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRANCISCA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a man's voice. Gentle Isabella,</div>
                              <div class="line">Turn you the key, and know his business of him;</div>
                              <div class="line">You may, I may not; you are yet unsworn.</div>
                              <div class="line">When you have vow'd, you must not speak with men</div>
                              <div class="line">But in the presence of the prioress:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, if you speak, you must not show your face,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, if you show your face, you must not speak.</div>
                              <div class="line">He calls again; I pray you, answer him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace and prosperity! Who is't that calls</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LUCIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail, virgin, if you be, as those cheek-roses</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaim you are no less! Can you so stead me</div>
                              <div class="line">As bring me to the sight of Isabella,</div>
                              <div class="line">A novice of this place and the fair sister</div>
                              <div class="line">To her unhappy brother Claudio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why 'her unhappy brother'? let me ask,</div>
                              <div class="line">The rather for I now must make you know</div>
                              <div class="line">I am that Isabella and his sister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle and fair, your brother kindly greets you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to be weary with you, he's in prison.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Woe me! for what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">For that which, if myself might be his judge,</div>
                              <div class="line">He should receive his punishment in thanks:</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath got his friend with child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, make me not your story.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is true.</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not--though 'tis my familiar sin</div>
                              <div class="line">With maids to seem the lapwing and to jest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Tongue far from heart--play with all virgins so:</div>
                              <div class="line">I hold you as a thing ensky'd and sainted.</div>
                              <div class="line">By your renouncement an immortal spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to be talk'd with in sincerity,</div>
                              <div class="line">As with a saint.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">You do blaspheme the good in mocking me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not believe it. Fewness and truth, 'tis thus:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your brother and his lover have embraced:</div>
                              <div class="line">As those that feed grow full, as blossoming time</div>
                              <div class="line">That from the seedness the bare fallow brings</div>
                              <div class="line">To teeming foison, even so her plenteous womb</div>
                              <div class="line">Expresseth his full tilth and husbandry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Some one with child by him? My cousin Juliet?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is she your cousin?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Adoptedly; as school-maids change their names</div>
                              <div class="line">By vain though apt affection.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She it is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, let him marry her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the point.</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke is very strangely gone from hence;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bore many gentlemen, myself being one,</div>
                              <div class="line">In hand and hope of action: but we do learn</div>
                              <div class="line">By those that know the very nerves of state,</div>
                              <div class="line">His givings-out were of an infinite distance</div>
                              <div class="line">From his true-meant design. Upon his place,</div>
                              <div class="line">And with full line of his authority,</div>
                              <div class="line">Governs Lord Angelo; a man whose blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Is very snow-broth; one who never feels</div>
                              <div class="line">The wanton stings and motions of the sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">But doth rebate and blunt his natural edge</div>
                              <div class="line">With profits of the mind, study and fast.</div>
                              <div class="line">He--to give fear to use and liberty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which have for long run by the hideous law,</div>
                              <div class="line">As mice by lions--hath pick'd out an act,</div>
                              <div class="line">Under whose heavy sense your brother's life</div>
                              <div class="line">Falls into forfeit: he arrests him on it;</div>
                              <div class="line">And follows close the rigour of the statute,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make him an example. All hope is gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless you have the grace by your fair prayer</div>
                              <div class="line">To soften Angelo: and that's my pith of business</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twixt you and your poor brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth he so seek his life?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Has censured him</div>
                              <div class="line">Already; and, as I hear, the provost hath</div>
                              <div class="line">A warrant for his execution.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas! what poor ability's in me</div>
                              <div class="line">To do him good?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Assay the power you have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">My power? Alas, I doubt--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Our doubts are traitors</div>
                              <div class="line">And make us lose the good we oft might win</div>
                              <div class="line">By fearing to attempt. Go to Lord Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let him learn to know, when maidens sue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Men give like gods; but when they weep and kneel,</div>
                              <div class="line">All their petitions are as freely theirs</div>
                              <div class="line">As they themselves would owe them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll see what I can do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But speedily.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will about it straight;</div>
                              <div class="line">No longer staying but to give the mother</div>
                              <div class="line">Notice of my affair. I humbly thank you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to my brother: soon at night</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send him certain word of my success.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I take my leave of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sir, adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  Another room in the same.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  A room in a prison.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.5">4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANGELO, ESCALUS, and a Justice, Provost,
Officers, and other Attendants, behind</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">We must not make a scarecrow of the law,</div>
                              <div class="line">Setting it up to fear the birds of prey,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let it keep one shape, till custom make it</div>
                              <div class="line">Their perch and not their terror.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but yet</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us be keen, and rather cut a little,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than fall, and bruise to death. Alas, this gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I would save, had a most noble father!</div>
                              <div class="line">Let but your honour know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I believe to be most strait in virtue,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, in the working of your own affections,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had time cohered with place or place with wishing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or that the resolute acting of your blood</div>
                              <div class="line">Could have attain'd the effect of your own purpose,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether you had not sometime in your life</div>
                              <div class="line">Err'd in this point which now you censure him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pull'd the law upon you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis one thing to be tempted, Escalus,</div>
                              <div class="line">Another thing to fall. I not deny,</div>
                              <div class="line">The jury, passing on the prisoner's life,</div>
                              <div class="line">May in the sworn twelve have a thief or two</div>
                              <div class="line">Guiltier than him they try. What's open made to justice,</div>
                              <div class="line">That justice seizes: what know the laws</div>
                              <div class="line">That thieves do pass on thieves? 'Tis very pregnant,</div>
                              <div class="line">The jewel that we find, we stoop and take't</div>
                              <div class="line">Because we see it; but what we do not see</div>
                              <div class="line">We tread upon, and never think of it.</div>
                              <div class="line">You may not so extenuate his offence</div>
                              <div class="line">For I have had such faults; but rather tell me,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I, that censure him, do so offend,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let mine own judgment pattern out my death,</div>
                              <div class="line">And nothing come in partial. Sir, he must die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Be it as your wisdom will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is the provost?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, if it like your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">See that Claudio</div>
                              <div class="line">Be executed by nine to-morrow morning:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring him his confessor, let him be prepared;</div>
                              <div class="line">For that's the utmost of his pilgrimage.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Provost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Well, heaven forgive him! and forgive us all!</div>
                              <div class="line">Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall:</div>
                              <div class="line">Some run from brakes of ice, and answer none:</div>
                              <div class="line">And some condemned for a fault alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ELBOW, and Officers with FROTH and POMPEY</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, bring them away: if these be good people in</div>
                              <div class="line">a commonweal that do nothing but use their abuses in</div>
                              <div class="line">common houses, I know no law: bring them away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, sir! What's your name? and what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">If it Please your honour, I am the poor duke's</div>
                              <div class="line">constable, and my name is Elbow: I do lean upon</div>
                              <div class="line">justice, sir, and do bring in here before your good</div>
                              <div class="line">honour two notorious benefactors.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Benefactors? Well; what benefactors are they? are</div>
                              <div class="line">they not malefactors?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">If it? please your honour, I know not well what they</div>
                              <div class="line">are: but precise villains they are, that I am sure</div>
                              <div class="line">of; and void of all profanation in the world that</div>
                              <div class="line">good Christians ought to have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">This comes off well; here's a wise officer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to: what quality are they of? Elbow is your</div>
                              <div class="line">name? why dost thou not speak, Elbow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">He cannot, sir; he's out at elbow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">What are you, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">He, sir! a tapster, sir; parcel-bawd; one that</div>
                              <div class="line">serves a bad woman; whose house, sir, was, as they</div>
                              <div class="line">say, plucked down in the suburbs; and now she</div>
                              <div class="line">professes a hot-house, which, I think, is a very ill house too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How know you that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife, sir, whom I detest before heaven and your honour,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How? thy wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir; whom, I thank heaven, is an honest woman,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou detest her therefore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, sir, I will detest myself also, as well as</div>
                              <div class="line">she, that this house, if it be not a bawd's house,</div>
                              <div class="line">it is pity of her life, for it is a naughty house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How dost thou know that, constable?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, by my wife; who, if she had been a woman</div>
                              <div class="line">cardinally given, might have been accused in</div>
                              <div class="line">fornication, adultery, and all uncleanliness there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">By the woman's means?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, by Mistress Overdone's means: but as she</div>
                              <div class="line">spit in his face, so she defied him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, if it please your honour, this is not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Prove it before these varlets here, thou honourable</div>
                              <div class="line">man; prove it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you hear how he misplaces?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, she came in great with child; and longing,</div>
                              <div class="line">saving your honour's reverence, for stewed prunes;</div>
                              <div class="line">sir, we had but two in the house, which at that very</div>
                              <div class="line">distant time stood, as it were, in a fruit-dish, a</div>
                              <div class="line">dish of some three-pence; your honours have seen</div>
                              <div class="line">such dishes; they are not China dishes, but very</div>
                              <div class="line">good dishes,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, go to: no matter for the dish, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">No, indeed, sir, not of a pin; you are therein in</div>
                              <div class="line">the right: but to the point. As I say, this</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Elbow, being, as I say, with child, and</div>
                              <div class="line">being great-bellied, and longing, as I said, for</div>
                              <div class="line">prunes; and having but two in the dish, as I said,</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Froth here, this very man, having eaten the</div>
                              <div class="line">rest, as I said, and, as I say, paying for them very</div>
                              <div class="line">honestly; for, as you know, Master Froth, I could</div>
                              <div class="line">not give you three-pence again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">No, indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well: you being then, if you be remembered,</div>
                              <div class="line">cracking the stones of the foresaid prunes,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, so I did indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, very well; I telling you then, if you be</div>
                              <div class="line">remembered, that such a one and such a one were past</div>
                              <div class="line">cure of the thing you wot of, unless they kept very</div>
                              <div class="line">good diet, as I told you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">All this is true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, very well, then,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, you are a tedious fool: to the purpose. What</div>
                              <div class="line">was done to Elbow's wife, that he hath cause to</div>
                              <div class="line">complain of? Come me to what was done to her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, your honour cannot come to that yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, sir, nor I mean it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, but you shall come to it, by your honour's</div>
                              <div class="line">leave. And, I beseech you, look into Master Froth</div>
                              <div class="line">here, sir; a man of four-score pound a year; whose</div>
                              <div class="line">father died at Hallowmas: was't not at Hallowmas,</div>
                              <div class="line">Master Froth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">All-hallond eve.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, very well; I hope here be truths. He, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">sitting, as I say, in a lower chair, sir; 'twas in</div>
                              <div class="line">the Bunch of Grapes, where indeed you have a delight</div>
                              <div class="line">to sit, have you not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">I have so; because it is an open room and good for winter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, very well, then; I hope here be truths.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">This will last out a night in Russia,</div>
                              <div class="line">When nights are longest there: I'll take my leave.</div>
                              <div class="line">And leave you to the hearing of the cause;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hoping you'll find good cause to whip them all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I think no less. Good morrow to your lordship.</div>
                              <p>Exit ANGELO</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, sir, come on: what was done to Elbow's wife, once more?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Once, sir? there was nothing done to her once.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you, sir, ask him what this man did to my wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech your honour, ask me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir; what did this gentleman to her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman's face.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Master Froth, look upon his honour; 'tis for a</div>
                              <div class="line">good purpose. Doth your honour mark his face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay; I beseech you, mark it well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I do so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth your honour see any harm in his face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be supposed upon a book, his face is the worst</div>
                              <div class="line">thing about him. Good, then; if his face be the</div>
                              <div class="line">worst thing about him, how could Master Froth do the</div>
                              <div class="line">constable's wife any harm? I would know that of</div>
                              <div class="line">your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He's in the right. Constable, what say you to it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">First, an it like you, the house is a respected</div>
                              <div class="line">house; next, this is a respected fellow; and his</div>
                              <div class="line">mistress is a respected woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">By this hand, sir, his wife is a more respected</div>
                              <div class="line">person than any of us all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicked varlet! the</div>
                              <div class="line">time has yet to come that she was ever respected</div>
                              <div class="line">with man, woman, or child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, she was respected with him before he married with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is the wiser here? Justice or Iniquity? Is</div>
                              <div class="line">this true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked</div>
                              <div class="line">Hannibal! I respected with her before I was married</div>
                              <div class="line">to her! If ever I was respected with her, or she</div>
                              <div class="line">with me, let not your worship think me the poor</div>
                              <div class="line">duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have mine action of battery on thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">If he took you a box o' the ear, you might have your</div>
                              <div class="line">action of slander too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I thank your good worship for it. What is't</div>
                              <div class="line">your worship's pleasure I shall do with this wicked caitiff?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, officer, because he hath some offences in him</div>
                              <div class="line">that thou wouldst discover if thou couldst, let him</div>
                              <div class="line">continue in his courses till thou knowest what they</div>
                              <div class="line">are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, I thank your worship for it. Thou seest, thou</div>
                              <div class="line">wicked varlet, now, what's come upon thee: thou art</div>
                              <div class="line">to continue now, thou varlet; thou art to continue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Where were you born, friend?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Here in Vienna, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you of fourscore pounds a year?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, an't please you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">So. What trade are you of, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPHEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Your mistress' name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPHEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Overdone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath she had any more than one husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Nine, sir; Overdone by the last.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Nine! Come hither to me, Master Froth. Master</div>
                              <div class="line">Froth, I would not have you acquainted with</div>
                              <div class="line">tapsters: they will draw you, Master Froth, and you</div>
                              <div class="line">will hang them. Get you gone, and let me hear no</div>
                              <div class="line">more of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FROTH</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank your worship. For mine own part, I never</div>
                              <div class="line">come into any room in a tap-house, but I am drawn</div>
                              <div class="line">in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, no more of it, Master Froth: farewell.</div>
                              <p>Exit FROTH</p>
                              <div class="line">Come you hither to me, Master tapster. What's your</div>
                              <div class="line">name, Master tapster?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Pompey.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">What else?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Bum, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Troth, and your bum is the greatest thing about you;</div>
                              <div class="line">so that in the beastliest sense you are Pompey the</div>
                              <div class="line">Great. Pompey, you are partly a bawd, Pompey,</div>
                              <div class="line">howsoever you colour it in being a tapster, are you</div>
                              <div class="line">not? come, tell me true: it shall be the better for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, sir, I am a poor fellow that would live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">How would you live, Pompey? by being a bawd? What</div>
                              <div class="line">do you think of the trade, Pompey? is it a lawful trade?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">If the law would allow it, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">But the law will not allow it, Pompey; nor it shall</div>
                              <div class="line">not be allowed in Vienna.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Does your worship mean to geld and splay all the</div>
                              <div class="line">youth of the city?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Pompey.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, sir, in my poor opinion, they will to't then.</div>
                              <div class="line">If your worship will take order for the drabs and</div>
                              <div class="line">the knaves, you need not to fear the bawds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">There are pretty orders beginning, I can tell you:</div>
                              <div class="line">it is but heading and hanging.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">If you head and hang all that offend that way but</div>
                              <div class="line">for ten year together, you'll be glad to give out a</div>
                              <div class="line">commission for more heads: if this law hold in</div>
                              <div class="line">Vienna ten year, I'll rent the fairest house in it</div>
                              <div class="line">after three-pence a bay: if you live to see this</div>
                              <div class="line">come to pass, say Pompey told you so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Thank you, good Pompey; and, in requital of your</div>
                              <div class="line">prophecy, hark you: I advise you, let me not find</div>
                              <div class="line">you before me again upon any complaint whatsoever;</div>
                              <div class="line">no, not for dwelling where you do: if I do, Pompey,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall beat you to your tent, and prove a shrewd</div>
                              <div class="line">Caesar to you; in plain dealing, Pompey, I shall</div>
                              <div class="line">have you whipt: so, for this time, Pompey, fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">POMPEY</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank your worship for your good counsel:</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">but I shall follow it as the flesh and fortune shall</div>
                              <div class="line">better determine.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whip me? No, no; let carman whip his jade:</div>
                              <div class="line">The valiant heart is not whipt out of his trade.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither to me, Master Elbow; come hither, Master</div>
                              <div class="line">constable. How long have you been in this place of constable?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Seven year and a half, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I thought, by your readiness in the office, you had</div>
                              <div class="line">continued in it some time. You say, seven years together?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">And a half, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, it hath been great pains to you. They do you</div>
                              <div class="line">wrong to put you so oft upon 't: are there not men</div>
                              <div class="line">in your ward sufficient to serve it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, sir, few of any wit in such matters: as they</div>
                              <div class="line">are chosen, they are glad to choose me for them; I</div>
                              <div class="line">do it for some piece of money, and go through with</div>
                              <div class="line">all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Look you bring me in the names of some six or seven,</div>
                              <div class="line">the most sufficient of your parish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ELBOW</div>
                              <div class="line">To your worship's house, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">To my house. Fare you well.</div>
                              <p>Exit ELBOW</p>
                              <div class="line">What's o'clock, think you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                              <div class="line">Eleven, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you home to dinner with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly thank you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It grieves me for the death of Claudio;</div>
                              <div class="line">But there's no remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Justice</div>
                              <div class="line">Lord Angelo is severe.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">It is but needful:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mercy is not itself, that oft looks so;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon is still the nurse of second woe:</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet,--poor Claudio! There is no remedy.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another room in the same.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter Provost and a Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
