                              <div class="line">He's hearing of a cause; he will come straight</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell him of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, do.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">I'll know</div>
                              <div class="line">His pleasure; may be he will relent. Alas,</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath but as offended in a dream!</div>
                              <div class="line">All sects, all ages smack of this vice; and he</div>
                              <div class="line">To die for't!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, what's the matter. Provost?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it your will Claudio shall die tomorrow?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not I tell thee yea? hadst thou not order?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why dost thou ask again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest I might be too rash:</div>
                              <div class="line">Under your good correction, I have seen,</div>
                              <div class="line">When, after execution, judgment hath</div>
                              <div class="line">Repented o'er his doom.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; let that be mine:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you your office, or give up your place,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall well be spared.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">I crave your honour's pardon.</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall be done, sir, with the groaning Juliet?</div>
                              <div class="line">She's very near her hour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dispose of her</div>
                              <div class="line">To some more fitter place, and that with speed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Servant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is the sister of the man condemn'd</div>
                              <div class="line">Desires access to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he a sister?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my good lord; a very virtuous maid,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to be shortly of a sisterhood,</div>
                              <div class="line">If not already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, let her be admitted.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">See you the fornicatress be removed:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let have needful, but not lavish, means;</div>
                              <div class="line">There shall be order for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ISABELLA and LUCIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">God save your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stay a little while.</div>
                              <p>To ISABELLA</p>
                              <div class="line">You're welcome: what's your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a woeful suitor to your honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Please but your honour hear me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; what's your suit?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">There is a vice that most I do abhor,</div>
                              <div class="line">And most desire should meet the blow of justice;</div>
                              <div class="line">For which I would not plead, but that I must;</div>
                              <div class="line">For which I must not plead, but that I am</div>
                              <div class="line">At war 'twixt will and will not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a brother is condemn'd to die:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you, let it be his fault,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not my brother.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Heaven give thee moving graces!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Condemn the fault and not the actor of it?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, every fault's condemn'd ere it be done:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine were the very cipher of a function,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fine the faults whose fine stands in record,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let go by the actor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O just but severe law!</div>
                              <div class="line">I had a brother, then. Heaven keep your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Give't not o'er so: to him</div>
                              <div class="line">again, entreat him;</div>
                              <div class="line">Kneel down before him, hang upon his gown:</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too cold; if you should need a pin,</div>
                              <div class="line">You could not with more tame a tongue desire it:</div>
                              <div class="line">To him, I say!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Must he needs die?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Maiden, no remedy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes; I do think that you might pardon him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And neither heaven nor man grieve at the mercy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not do't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">But can you, if you would?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, what I will not, that I cannot do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">But might you do't, and do the world no wrong,</div>
                              <div class="line">If so your heart were touch'd with that remorse</div>
                              <div class="line">As mine is to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">He's sentenced; 'tis too late.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  You are too cold.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Too late? why, no; I, that do speak a word.</div>
                              <div class="line">May call it back again. Well, believe this,</div>
                              <div class="line">No ceremony that to great ones 'longs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not the king's crown, nor the deputed sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">The marshal's truncheon, nor the judge's robe,</div>
                              <div class="line">Become them with one half so good a grace</div>
                              <div class="line">As mercy does.</div>
                              <div class="line">If he had been as you and you as he,</div>
                              <div class="line">You would have slipt like him; but he, like you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would not have been so stern.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, be gone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I would to heaven I had your potency,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you were Isabel! should it then be thus?</div>
                              <div class="line">No; I would tell what 'twere to be a judge,</div>
                              <div class="line">And what a prisoner.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>
                              </div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, touch him; there's the vein.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Your brother is a forfeit of the law,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you but waste your words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, alas!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, all the souls that were were forfeit once;</div>
                              <div class="line">And He that might the vantage best have took</div>
                              <div class="line">Found out the remedy. How would you be,</div>
                              <div class="line">If He, which is the top of judgment, should</div>
                              <div class="line">But judge you as you are? O, think on that;</div>
                              <div class="line">And mercy then will breathe within your lips,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like man new made.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be you content, fair maid;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the law, not I condemn your brother:</div>
                              <div class="line">Were he my kinsman, brother, or my son,</div>
                              <div class="line">It should be thus with him: he must die tomorrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow! O, that's sudden! Spare him, spare him!</div>
                              <div class="line">He's not prepared for death. Even for our kitchens</div>
                              <div class="line">We kill the fowl of season: shall we serve heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">With less respect than we do minister</div>
                              <div class="line">To our gross selves? Good, good my lord, bethink you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is it that hath died for this offence?</div>
                              <div class="line">There's many have committed it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>           Ay, well said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">The law hath not been dead, though it hath slept:</div>
                              <div class="line">Those many had not dared to do that evil,</div>
                              <div class="line">If the first that did the edict infringe</div>
                              <div class="line">Had answer'd for his deed: now 'tis awake</div>
                              <div class="line">Takes note of what is done; and, like a prophet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Looks in a glass, that shows what future evils,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either new, or by remissness new-conceived,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so in progress to be hatch'd and born,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are now to have no successive degrees,</div>
                              <div class="line">But, ere they live, to end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet show some pity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I show it most of all when I show justice;</div>
                              <div class="line">For then I pity those I do not know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which a dismiss'd offence would after gall;</div>
                              <div class="line">And do him right that, answering one foul wrong,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lives not to act another. Be satisfied;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your brother dies to-morrow; be content.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">So you must be the first that gives this sentence,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he, that suffer's. O, it is excellent</div>
                              <div class="line">To have a giant's strength; but it is tyrannous</div>
                              <div class="line">To use it like a giant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>   That's well said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Could great men thunder</div>
                              <div class="line">As Jove himself does, Jove would ne'er be quiet,</div>
                              <div class="line">For every pelting, petty officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Would use his heaven for thunder;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing but thunder! Merciful Heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou rather with thy sharp and sulphurous bolt</div>
                              <div class="line">Split'st the unwedgeable and gnarled oak</div>
                              <div class="line">Than the soft myrtle: but man, proud man,</div>
                              <div class="line">Drest in a little brief authority,</div>
                              <div class="line">Most ignorant of what he's most assured,</div>
                              <div class="line">His glassy essence, like an angry ape,</div>
                              <div class="line">Plays such fantastic tricks before high heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">As make the angels weep; who, with our spleens,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would all themselves laugh mortal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  O, to him, to him, wench! he</div>
                              <div class="line">will relent;</div>
                              <div class="line">He's coming; I perceive 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Pray heaven she win him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">We cannot weigh our brother with ourself:</div>
                              <div class="line">Great men may jest with saints; 'tis wit in them,</div>
                              <div class="line">But in the less foul profanation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt i' the right, girl; more o, that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">That in the captain's but a choleric word,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which in the soldier is flat blasphemy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Art avised o' that? more on 't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you put these sayings upon me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Because authority, though it err like others,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath yet a kind of medicine in itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">That skins the vice o' the top. Go to your bosom;</div>
                              <div class="line">Knock there, and ask your heart what it doth know</div>
                              <div class="line">That's like my brother's fault: if it confess</div>
                              <div class="line">A natural guiltiness such as is his,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it not sound a thought upon your tongue</div>
                              <div class="line">Against my brother's life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>                  She speaks, and 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">Such sense, that my sense breeds with it. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentle my lord, turn back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will bethink me: come again tomorrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark how I'll bribe you: good my lord, turn back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">How! bribe me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with such gifts that heaven shall share with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  You had marr'd all else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Not with fond shekels of the tested gold,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or stones whose rates are either rich or poor</div>
                              <div class="line">As fancy values them; but with true prayers</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall be up at heaven and enter there</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere sun-rise, prayers from preserved souls,</div>
                              <div class="line">From fasting maids whose minds are dedicate</div>
                              <div class="line">To nothing temporal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; come to me to-morrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to ISABELLA</span>  Go to; 'tis well; away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven keep your honour safe!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span> Amen:</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am that way going to temptation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where prayers cross.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">At what hour to-morrow</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I attend your lordship?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">At any time 'fore noon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Save your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt ISABELLA, LUCIO, and Provost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">From thee, even from thy virtue!</div>
                              <div class="line">What's this, what's this? Is this her fault or mine?</div>
                              <div class="line">The tempter or the tempted, who sins most?</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                              <div class="line">Not she: nor doth she tempt: but it is I</div>
                              <div class="line">That, lying by the violet in the sun,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do as the carrion does, not as the flower,</div>
                              <div class="line">Corrupt with virtuous season. Can it be</div>
                              <div class="line">That modesty may more betray our sense</div>
                              <div class="line">Than woman's lightness? Having waste ground enough,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall we desire to raze the sanctuary</div>
                              <div class="line">And pitch our evils there? O, fie, fie, fie!</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou, or what art thou, Angelo?</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou desire her foully for those things</div>
                              <div class="line">That make her good? O, let her brother live!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thieves for their robbery have authority</div>
                              <div class="line">When judges steal themselves. What, do I love her,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I desire to hear her speak again,</div>
                              <div class="line">And feast upon her eyes? What is't I dream on?</div>
                              <div class="line">O cunning enemy, that, to catch a saint,</div>
                              <div class="line">With saints dost bait thy hook! Most dangerous</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that temptation that doth goad us on</div>
                              <div class="line">To sin in loving virtue: never could the strumpet,</div>
                              <div class="line">With all her double vigour, art and nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Once stir my temper; but this virtuous maid</div>
                              <div class="line">Subdues me quite. Even till now,</div>
                              <div class="line">When men were fond, I smiled and wonder'd how.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in a prison.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter, severally, DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as a
friar, and Provost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail to you, provost! so I think you are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the provost. What's your will, good friar?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Bound by my charity and my blest order,</div>
                              <div class="line">I come to visit the afflicted spirits</div>
                              <div class="line">Here in the prison. Do me the common right</div>
                              <div class="line">To let me see them and to make me know</div>
                              <div class="line">The nature of their crimes, that I may minister</div>
                              <div class="line">To them accordingly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">I would do more than that, if more were needful.</div>
                              <p>Enter JULIET</p>
                              <div class="line">Look, here comes one: a gentlewoman of mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, falling in the flaws of her own youth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath blister'd her report: she is with child;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he that got it, sentenced; a young man</div>
                              <div class="line">More fit to do another such offence</div>
                              <div class="line">Than die for this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">When must he die?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">As I do think, to-morrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have provided for you: stay awhile,</div>
                              <p>To JULIET</p>
                              <div class="line">And you shall be conducted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Repent you, fair one, of the sin you carry?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I do; and bear the shame most patiently.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll teach you how you shall arraign your conscience,</div>
                              <div class="line">And try your penitence, if it be sound,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or hollowly put on.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll gladly learn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Love you the man that wrong'd you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, as I love the woman that wrong'd him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">So then it seems your most offenceful act</div>
                              <div class="line">Was mutually committed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Mutually.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then was your sin of heavier kind than his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I do confess it, and repent it, father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis meet so, daughter: but lest you do repent,</div>
                              <div class="line">As that the sin hath brought you to this shame,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which sorrow is always towards ourselves, not heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">Showing we would not spare heaven as we love it,</div>
                              <div class="line">But as we stand in fear,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">I do repent me, as it is an evil,</div>
                              <div class="line">And take the shame with joy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">There rest.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your partner, as I hear, must die to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I am going with instruction to him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Grace go with you, Benedicite!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">JULIET</div>
                              <div class="line">Must die to-morrow! O injurious love,</div>
                              <div class="line">That respites me a life, whose very comfort</div>
                              <div class="line">Is still a dying horror!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis pity of him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANGELO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">When I would pray and think, I think and pray</div>
                              <div class="line">To several subjects. Heaven hath my empty words;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst my invention, hearing not my tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Anchors on Isabel: Heaven in my mouth,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if I did but only chew his name;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in my heart the strong and swelling evil</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my conception. The state, whereon I studied</div>
                              <div class="line">Is like a good thing, being often read,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grown fear'd and tedious; yea, my gravity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein--let no man hear me--I take pride,</div>
                              <div class="line">Could I with boot change for an idle plume,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which the air beats for vain. O place, O form,</div>
                              <div class="line">How often dost thou with thy case, thy habit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wrench awe from fools and tie the wiser souls</div>
                              <div class="line">To thy false seeming! Blood, thou art blood:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's write good angel on the devil's horn:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not the devil's crest.</div>
                              <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! who's there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Servant</div>
                              <div class="line">One Isabel, a sister, desires access to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Teach her the way.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">O heavens!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why does my blood thus muster to my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Making both it unable for itself,</div>
                              <div class="line">And dispossessing all my other parts</div>
                              <div class="line">Of necessary fitness?</div>
                              <div class="line">So play the foolish throngs with one that swoons;</div>
                              <div class="line">Come all to help him, and so stop the air</div>
                              <div class="line">By which he should revive: and even so</div>
                              <div class="line">The general, subject to a well-wish'd king,</div>
                              <div class="line">Quit their own part, and in obsequious fondness</div>
                              <div class="line">Crowd to his presence, where their untaught love</div>
                              <div class="line">Must needs appear offence.</div>
                              <p>Enter ISABELLA</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, fair maid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am come to know your pleasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">That you might know it, would much better please me</div>
                              <div class="line">Than to demand what 'tis. Your brother cannot live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so. Heaven keep your honour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet may he live awhile; and, it may be,</div>
                              <div class="line">As long as you or I yet he must die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Under your sentence?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yea.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">When, I beseech you? that in his reprieve,</div>
                              <div class="line">Longer or shorter, he may be so fitted</div>
                              <div class="line">That his soul sicken not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! fie, these filthy vices! It were as good</div>
                              <div class="line">To pardon him that hath from nature stolen</div>
                              <div class="line">A man already made, as to remit</div>
                              <div class="line">Their saucy sweetness that do coin heaven's image</div>
                              <div class="line">In stamps that are forbid: 'tis all as easy</div>
                              <div class="line">Falsely to take away a life true made</div>
                              <div class="line">As to put metal in restrained means</div>
                              <div class="line">To make a false one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis set down so in heaven, but not in earth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Say you so? then I shall pose you quickly.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which had you rather, that the most just law</div>
                              <div class="line">Now took your brother's life; or, to redeem him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give up your body to such sweet uncleanness</div>
                              <div class="line">As she that he hath stain'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, believe this,</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather give my body than my soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I talk not of your soul: our compell'd sins</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand more for number than for accompt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">How say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I'll not warrant that; for I can speak</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the thing I say. Answer to this:</div>
                              <div class="line">I, now the voice of the recorded law,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pronounce a sentence on your brother's life:</div>
                              <div class="line">Might there not be a charity in sin</div>
                              <div class="line">To save this brother's life?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Please you to do't,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll take it as a peril to my soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no sin at all, but charity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pleased you to do't at peril of your soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were equal poise of sin and charity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">That I do beg his life, if it be sin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven let me bear it! you granting of my suit,</div>
                              <div class="line">If that be sin, I'll make it my morn prayer</div>
                              <div class="line">To have it added to the faults of mine,</div>
                              <div class="line">And nothing of your answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but hear me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Your sense pursues not mine: either you are ignorant,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or seem so craftily; and that's not good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be ignorant, and in nothing good,</div>
                              <div class="line">But graciously to know I am no better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus wisdom wishes to appear most bright</div>
                              <div class="line">When it doth tax itself; as these black masks</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaim an enshield beauty ten times louder</div>
                              <div class="line">Than beauty could, display'd. But mark me;</div>
                              <div class="line">To be received plain, I'll speak more gross:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your brother is to die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">So.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">And his offence is so, as it appears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Accountant to the law upon that pain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">True.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Admit no other way to save his life,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As I subscribe not that, nor any other,</div>
                              <div class="line">But in the loss of question,--that you, his sister,</div>
                              <div class="line">Finding yourself desired of such a person,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose credit with the judge, or own great place,</div>
                              <div class="line">Could fetch your brother from the manacles</div>
                              <div class="line">Of the all-building law; and that there were</div>
                              <div class="line">No earthly mean to save him, but that either</div>
                              <div class="line">You must lay down the treasures of your body</div>
                              <div class="line">To this supposed, or else to let him suffer;</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">As much for my poor brother as myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">That is, were I under the terms of death,</div>
                              <div class="line">The impression of keen whips I'ld wear as rubies,</div>
                              <div class="line">And strip myself to death, as to a bed</div>
                              <div class="line">That longing have been sick for, ere I'ld yield</div>
                              <div class="line">My body up to shame.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then must your brother die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'twere the cheaper way:</div>
                              <div class="line">Better it were a brother died at once,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than that a sister, by redeeming him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should die for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Were not you then as cruel as the sentence</div>
                              <div class="line">That you have slander'd so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ignomy in ransom and free pardon</div>
                              <div class="line">Are of two houses: lawful mercy</div>
                              <div class="line">Is nothing kin to foul redemption.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You seem'd of late to make the law a tyrant;</div>
                              <div class="line">And rather proved the sliding of your brother</div>
                              <div class="line">A merriment than a vice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, pardon me, my lord; it oft falls out,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have what we would have, we speak not what we mean:</div>
                              <div class="line">I something do excuse the thing I hate,</div>
                              <div class="line">For his advantage that I dearly love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">We are all frail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Else let my brother die,</div>
                              <div class="line">If not a feodary, but only he</div>
                              <div class="line">Owe and succeed thy weakness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, women are frail too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, as the glasses where they view themselves;</div>
                              <div class="line">Which are as easy broke as they make forms.</div>
                              <div class="line">Women! Help Heaven! men their creation mar</div>
                              <div class="line">In profiting by them. Nay, call us ten times frail;</div>
                              <div class="line">For we are soft as our complexions are,</div>
                              <div class="line">And credulous to false prints.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it well:</div>
                              <div class="line">And from this testimony of your own sex,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Since I suppose we are made to be no stronger</div>
                              <div class="line">Than faults may shake our frames,--let me be bold;</div>
                              <div class="line">I do arrest your words. Be that you are,</div>
                              <div class="line">That is, a woman; if you be more, you're none;</div>
                              <div class="line">If you be one, as you are well express'd</div>
                              <div class="line">By all external warrants, show it now,</div>
                              <div class="line">By putting on the destined livery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no tongue but one: gentle my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me entreat you speak the former language.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Plainly conceive, I love you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">My brother did love Juliet,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you tell me that he shall die for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall not, Isabel, if you give me love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know your virtue hath a licence in't,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which seems a little fouler than it is,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pluck on others.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, on mine honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">My words express my purpose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! little honour to be much believed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And most pernicious purpose! Seeming, seeming!</div>
                              <div class="line">I will proclaim thee, Angelo; look for't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sign me a present pardon for my brother,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or with an outstretch'd throat I'll tell the world aloud</div>
                              <div class="line">What man thou art.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who will believe thee, Isabel?</div>
                              <div class="line">My unsoil'd name, the austereness of my life,</div>
                              <div class="line">My vouch against you, and my place i' the state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will so your accusation overweigh,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you shall stifle in your own report</div>
                              <div class="line">And smell of calumny. I have begun,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now I give my sensual race the rein:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fit thy consent to my sharp appetite;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay by all nicety and prolixious blushes,</div>
                              <div class="line">That banish what they sue for; redeem thy brother</div>
                              <div class="line">By yielding up thy body to my will;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else he must not only die the death,</div>
                              <div class="line">But thy unkindness shall his death draw out</div>
                              <div class="line">To lingering sufferance. Answer me to-morrow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or, by the affection that now guides me most,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll prove a tyrant to him. As for you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Say what you can, my false o'erweighs your true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom should I complain? Did I tell this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who would believe me? O perilous mouths,</div>
                              <div class="line">That bear in them one and the self-same tongue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either of condemnation or approof;</div>
                              <div class="line">Bidding the law make court'sy to their will:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hooking both right and wrong to the appetite,</div>
                              <div class="line">To follow as it draws! I'll to my brother:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though he hath fallen by prompture of the blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet hath he in him such a mind of honour.</div>
                              <div class="line">That, had he twenty heads to tender down</div>
                              <div class="line">On twenty bloody blocks, he'ld yield them up,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before his sister should her body stoop</div>
                              <div class="line">To such abhorr'd pollution.</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, Isabel, live chaste, and, brother, die:</div>
                              <div class="line">More than our brother is our chastity.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell him yet of Angelo's request,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fit his mind to death, for his soul's rest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  A room in the prison.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  The street before the prison.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A room in the prison.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO disguised as before, CLAUDIO,
and Provost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">So then you hope of pardon from Lord Angelo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CLAUDIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The miserable have no other medicine</div>
                              <div class="line">But only hope:</div>
                              <div class="line">I've hope to live, and am prepared to die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be absolute for death; either death or life</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall thereby be the sweeter. Reason thus with life:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do lose thee, I do lose a thing</div>
                              <div class="line">That none but fools would keep: a breath thou art,</div>
                              <div class="line">Servile to all the skyey influences,</div>
