                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Quick, dispatch, and send the head to Angelo.</div>
                              <p>Exit Provost</p>
                              <div class="line">Now will I write letters to Angelo,--</div>
                              <div class="line">The provost, he shall bear them, whose contents</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall witness to him I am near at home,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that, by great injunctions, I am bound</div>
                              <div class="line">To enter publicly: him I'll desire</div>
                              <div class="line">To meet me at the consecrated fount</div>
                              <div class="line">A league below the city; and from thence,</div>
                              <div class="line">By cold gradation and well-balanced form,</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall proceed with Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Provost</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is the head; I'll carry it myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Convenient is it. Make a swift return;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I would commune with you of such things</div>
                              <div class="line">That want no ear but yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Provost</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make all speed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  Peace, ho, be here!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The tongue of Isabel. She's come to know</div>
                              <div class="line">If yet her brother's pardon be come hither:</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will keep her ignorant of her good,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make her heavenly comforts of despair,</div>
                              <div class="line">When it is least expected.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter ISABELLA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ho, by your leave!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morning to you, fair and gracious daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">The better, given me by so holy a man.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath yet the deputy sent my brother's pardon?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath released him, Isabel, from the world:</div>
                              <div class="line">His head is off and sent to Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but it is not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is no other: show your wisdom, daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">In your close patience.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I will to him and pluck out his eyes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not be admitted to his sight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Unhappy Claudio! wretched Isabel!</div>
                              <div class="line">Injurious world! most damned Angelo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This nor hurts him nor profits you a jot;</div>
                              <div class="line">Forbear it therefore; give your cause to heaven.</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark what I say, which you shall find</div>
                              <div class="line">By every syllable a faithful verity:</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke comes home to-morrow; nay, dry your eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">One of our convent, and his confessor,</div>
                              <div class="line">Gives me this instance: already he hath carried</div>
                              <div class="line">Notice to Escalus and Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who do prepare to meet him at the gates,</div>
                              <div class="line">There to give up their power. If you can, pace your wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">In that good path that I would wish it go,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall have your bosom on this wretch,</div>
                              <div class="line">Grace of the duke, revenges to your heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">And general honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am directed by you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This letter, then, to Friar Peter give;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis that he sent me of the duke's return:</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, by this token, I desire his company</div>
                              <div class="line">At Mariana's house to-night. Her cause and yours</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll perfect him withal, and he shall bring you</div>
                              <div class="line">Before the duke, and to the head of Angelo</div>
                              <div class="line">Accuse him home and home. For my poor self,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am combined by a sacred vow</div>
                              <div class="line">And shall be absent. Wend you with this letter:</div>
                              <div class="line">Command these fretting waters from your eyes</div>
                              <div class="line">With a light heart; trust not my holy order,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I pervert your course. Who's here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LUCIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good even. Friar, where's the provost?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not within, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O pretty Isabella, I am pale at mine heart to see</div>
                              <div class="line">thine eyes so red: thou must be patient. I am fain</div>
                              <div class="line">to dine and sup with water and bran; I dare not for</div>
                              <div class="line">my head fill my belly; one fruitful meal would set</div>
                              <div class="line">me to 't. But they say the duke will be here</div>
                              <div class="line">to-morrow. By my troth, Isabel, I loved thy brother:</div>
                              <div class="line">if the old fantastical duke of dark corners had been</div>
                              <div class="line">at home, he had lived.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit ISABELLA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, the duke is marvellous little beholding to your</div>
                              <div class="line">reports; but the best is, he lives not in them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Friar, thou knowest not the duke so well as I do:</div>
                              <div class="line">he's a better woodman than thou takest him for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, you'll answer this one day. Fare ye well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, tarry; I'll go along with thee</div>
                              <div class="line">I can tell thee pretty tales of the duke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You have told me too many of him already, sir, if</div>
                              <div class="line">they be true; if not true, none were enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I was once before him for getting a wench with child.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you such a thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, marry, did I but I was fain to forswear it;</div>
                              <div class="line">they would else have married me to the rotten medlar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, your company is fairer than honest. Rest you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">By my troth, I'll go with thee to the lane's end:</div>
                              <div class="line">if bawdy talk offend you, we'll have very little of</div>
                              <div class="line">it. Nay, friar, I am a kind of burr; I shall stick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ANGELO and ESCALUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Every letter he hath writ hath disvouched other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">In most uneven and distracted manner. His actions</div>
                              <div class="line">show much like to madness: pray heaven his wisdom be</div>
                              <div class="line">not tainted! And why meet him at the gates, and</div>
                              <div class="line">redeliver our authorities there</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I guess not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">And why should we proclaim it in an hour before his</div>
                              <div class="line">entering, that if any crave redress of injustice,</div>
                              <div class="line">they should exhibit their petitions in the street?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">He shows his reason for that: to have a dispatch of</div>
                              <div class="line">complaints, and to deliver us from devices</div>
                              <div class="line">hereafter, which shall then have no power to stand</div>
                              <div class="line">against us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I beseech you, let it be proclaimed betimes</div>
                              <div class="line">i' the morn; I'll call you at your house: give</div>
                              <div class="line">notice to such men of sort and suit as are to meet</div>
                              <div class="line">him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall, sir. Fare you well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                              <p>Exit ESCALUS</p>
                              <div class="line">This deed unshapes me quite, makes me unpregnant</div>
                              <div class="line">And dull to all proceedings. A deflower'd maid!</div>
                              <div class="line">And by an eminent body that enforced</div>
                              <div class="line">The law against it! But that her tender shame</div>
                              <div class="line">Will not proclaim against her maiden loss,</div>
                              <div class="line">How might she tongue me! Yet reason dares her no;</div>
                              <div class="line">For my authority bears of a credent bulk,</div>
                              <div class="line">That no particular scandal once can touch</div>
                              <div class="line">But it confounds the breather. He should have lived,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save that riotous youth, with dangerous sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">Might in the times to come have ta'en revenge,</div>
                              <div class="line">By so receiving a dishonour'd life</div>
                              <div class="line">With ransom of such shame. Would yet he had lived!</div>
                              <div class="line">A lack, when once our grace we have forgot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing goes right: we would, and we would not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.6">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>5. SCENE V.  Fields without the town.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DUKE VINCENTIO in his own habit, and FRIAR PETER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">These letters at fit time deliver me</div>
                              <p>Giving letters</p>
                              <div class="line">The provost knows our purpose and our plot.</div>
                              <div class="line">The matter being afoot, keep your instruction,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hold you ever to our special drift;</div>
                              <div class="line">Though sometimes you do blench from this to that,</div>
                              <div class="line">As cause doth minister. Go call at Flavius' house,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell him where I stay: give the like notice</div>
                              <div class="line">To Valentinus, Rowland, and to Crassus,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid them bring the trumpets to the gate;</div>
                              <div class="line">But send me Flavius first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be speeded well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter VARRIUS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank thee, Varrius; thou hast made good haste:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, we will walk. There's other of our friends</div>
                              <div class="line">Will greet us here anon, my gentle Varrius.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.7">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>6. SCENE VI.  Street near the city gate.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter ISABELLA and MARIANA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak so indirectly I am loath:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would say the truth; but to accuse him so,</div>
                              <div class="line">That is your part: yet I am advised to do it;</div>
                              <div class="line">He says, to veil full purpose.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be ruled by him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, he tells me that, if peradventure</div>
                              <div class="line">He speak against me on the adverse side,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should not think it strange; for 'tis a physic</div>
                              <div class="line">That's bitter to sweet end.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">I would Friar Peter--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, peace! the friar is come.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter FRIAR PETER</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I have found you out a stand most fit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where you may have such vantage on the duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall not pass you. Twice have the trumpets sounded;</div>
                              <div class="line">The generous and gravest citizens</div>
                              <div class="line">Have hent the gates, and very near upon</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke is entering: therefore, hence, away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  The city gate.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  The city gate.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>MARIANA veiled, ISABELLA, and FRIAR PETER, at their
stand. Enter DUKE VINCENTIO, VARRIUS, Lords,
ANGELO, ESCALUS, LUCIO, Provost, Officers, and
Citizens, at several doors</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My very worthy cousin, fairly met!</div>
                              <div class="line">Our old and faithful friend, we are glad to see you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Happy return be to your royal grace!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Many and hearty thankings to you both.</div>
                              <div class="line">We have made inquiry of you; and we hear</div>
                              <div class="line">Such goodness of your justice, that our soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot but yield you forth to public thanks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Forerunning more requital.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">You make my bonds still greater.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, your desert speaks loud; and I should wrong it,</div>
                              <div class="line">To lock it in the wards of covert bosom,</div>
                              <div class="line">When it deserves, with characters of brass,</div>
                              <div class="line">A forted residence 'gainst the tooth of time</div>
                              <div class="line">And razure of oblivion. Give me your hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let the subject see, to make them know</div>
                              <div class="line">That outward courtesies would fain proclaim</div>
                              <div class="line">Favours that keep within. Come, Escalus,</div>
                              <div class="line">You must walk by us on our other hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">And good supporters are you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>FRIAR PETER and ISABELLA come forward</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Now is your time: speak loud and kneel before him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Justice, O royal duke! Vail your regard</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon a wrong'd, I would fain have said, a maid!</div>
                              <div class="line">O worthy prince, dishonour not your eye</div>
                              <div class="line">By throwing it on any other object</div>
                              <div class="line">Till you have heard me in my true complaint</div>
                              <div class="line">And given me justice, justice, justice, justice!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Relate your wrongs; in what? by whom? be brief.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is Lord Angelo shall give you justice:</div>
                              <div class="line">Reveal yourself to him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O worthy duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">You bid me seek redemption of the devil:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hear me yourself; for that which I must speak</div>
                              <div class="line">Must either punish me, not being believed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or wring redress from you. Hear me, O hear me, here!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, her wits, I fear me, are not firm:</div>
                              <div class="line">She hath been a suitor to me for her brother</div>
                              <div class="line">Cut off by course of justice,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">By course of justice!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">And she will speak most bitterly and strange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Most strange, but yet most truly, will I speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">That Angelo's forsworn; is it not strange?</div>
                              <div class="line">That Angelo's a murderer; is 't not strange?</div>
                              <div class="line">That Angelo is an adulterous thief,</div>
                              <div class="line">An hypocrite, a virgin-violator;</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it not strange and strange?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is ten times strange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not truer he is Angelo</div>
                              <div class="line">Than this is all as true as it is strange:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is ten times true; for truth is truth</div>
                              <div class="line">To the end of reckoning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Away with her! Poor soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">She speaks this in the infirmity of sense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O prince, I conjure thee, as thou believest</div>
                              <div class="line">There is another comfort than this world,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou neglect me not, with that opinion</div>
                              <div class="line">That I am touch'd with madness! Make not impossible</div>
                              <div class="line">That which but seems unlike: 'tis not impossible</div>
                              <div class="line">But one, the wicked'st caitiff on the ground,</div>
                              <div class="line">May seem as shy, as grave, as just, as absolute</div>
                              <div class="line">As Angelo; even so may Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">In all his dressings, characts, titles, forms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be an arch-villain; believe it, royal prince:</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be less, he's nothing; but he's more,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I more name for badness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">By mine honesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be mad,--as I believe no other,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Her madness hath the oddest frame of sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">Such a dependency of thing on thing,</div>
                              <div class="line">As e'er I heard in madness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O gracious duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">Harp not on that, nor do not banish reason</div>
                              <div class="line">For inequality; but let your reason serve</div>
                              <div class="line">To make the truth appear where it seems hid,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hide the false seems true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Many that are not mad</div>
                              <div class="line">Have, sure, more lack of reason. What would you say?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am the sister of one Claudio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Condemn'd upon the act of fornication</div>
                              <div class="line">To lose his head; condemn'd by Angelo:</div>
                              <div class="line">I, in probation of a sisterhood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was sent to by my brother; one Lucio</div>
                              <div class="line">As then the messenger,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's I, an't like your grace:</div>
                              <div class="line">I came to her from Claudio, and desired her</div>
                              <div class="line">To try her gracious fortune with Lord Angelo</div>
                              <div class="line">For her poor brother's pardon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">That's he indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You were not bid to speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my good lord;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor wish'd to hold my peace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I wish you now, then;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, take note of it: and when you have</div>
                              <div class="line">A business for yourself, pray heaven you then</div>
                              <div class="line">Be perfect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The warrants for yourself; take heed to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">This gentleman told somewhat of my tale,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It may be right; but you are i' the wrong</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak before your time. Proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">I went</div>
                              <div class="line">To this pernicious caitiff deputy,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's somewhat madly spoken.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon it;</div>
                              <div class="line">The phrase is to the matter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mended again. The matter; proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">In brief, to set the needless process by,</div>
                              <div class="line">How I persuaded, how I pray'd, and kneel'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">How he refell'd me, and how I replied,--</div>
                              <div class="line">For this was of much length,--the vile conclusion</div>
                              <div class="line">I now begin with grief and shame to utter:</div>
                              <div class="line">He would not, but by gift of my chaste body</div>
                              <div class="line">To his concupiscible intemperate lust,</div>
                              <div class="line">Release my brother; and, after much debatement,</div>
                              <div class="line">My sisterly remorse confutes mine honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I did yield to him: but the next morn betimes,</div>
                              <div class="line">His purpose surfeiting, he sends a warrant</div>
                              <div class="line">For my poor brother's head.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is most likely!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that it were as like as it is true!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, fond wretch, thou knowist not what thou speak'st,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else thou art suborn'd against his honour</div>
                              <div class="line">In hateful practise. First, his integrity</div>
                              <div class="line">Stands without blemish. Next, it imports no reason</div>
                              <div class="line">That with such vehemency he should pursue</div>
                              <div class="line">Faults proper to himself: if he had so offended,</div>
                              <div class="line">He would have weigh'd thy brother by himself</div>
                              <div class="line">And not have cut him off. Some one hath set you on:</div>
                              <div class="line">Confess the truth, and say by whose advice</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou camest here to complain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">And is this all?</div>
                              <div class="line">Then, O you blessed ministers above,</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep me in patience, and with ripen'd time</div>
                              <div class="line">Unfold the evil which is here wrapt up</div>
                              <div class="line">In countenance! Heaven shield your grace from woe,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I, thus wrong'd, hence unbelieved go!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know you'ld fain be gone. An officer!</div>
                              <div class="line">To prison with her! Shall we thus permit</div>
                              <div class="line">A blasting and a scandalous breath to fall</div>
                              <div class="line">On him so near us? This needs must be a practise.</div>
                              <div class="line">Who knew of Your intent and coming hither?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ISABELLA</div>
                              <div class="line">One that I would were here, Friar Lodowick.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A ghostly father, belike. Who knows that Lodowick?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I know him; 'tis a meddling friar;</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like the man: had he been lay, my lord</div>
                              <div class="line">For certain words he spake against your grace</div>
                              <div class="line">In your retirement, I had swinged him soundly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Words against me? this is a good friar, belike!</div>
                              <div class="line">And to set on this wretched woman here</div>
                              <div class="line">Against our substitute! Let this friar be found.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But yesternight, my lord, she and that friar,</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw them at the prison: a saucy friar,</div>
                              <div class="line">A very scurvy fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessed be your royal grace!</div>
                              <div class="line">I have stood by, my lord, and I have heard</div>
                              <div class="line">Your royal ear abused. First, hath this woman</div>
                              <div class="line">Most wrongfully accused your substitute,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is as free from touch or soil with her</div>
                              <div class="line">As she from one ungot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">We did believe no less.</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you that Friar Lodowick that she speaks of?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">I know him for a man divine and holy;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not scurvy, nor a temporary meddler,</div>
                              <div class="line">As he's reported by this gentleman;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, on my trust, a man that never yet</div>
                              <div class="line">Did, as he vouches, misreport your grace.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, most villanously; believe it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, he in time may come to clear himself;</div>
                              <div class="line">But at this instant he is sick my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of a strange fever. Upon his mere request,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being come to knowledge that there was complaint</div>
                              <div class="line">Intended 'gainst Lord Angelo, came I hither,</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak, as from his mouth, what he doth know</div>
                              <div class="line">Is true and false; and what he with his oath</div>
                              <div class="line">And all probation will make up full clear,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whensoever he's convented. First, for this woman.</div>
                              <div class="line">To justify this worthy nobleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">So vulgarly and personally accused,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her shall you hear disproved to her eyes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till she herself confess it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good friar, let's hear it.</div>
                              <p>ISABELLA is carried off guarded; and MARIANA comes forward</p>
                              <div class="line">Do you not smile at this, Lord Angelo?</div>
                              <div class="line">O heaven, the vanity of wretched fools!</div>
                              <div class="line">Give us some seats. Come, cousin Angelo;</div>
                              <div class="line">In this I'll be impartial; be you judge</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your own cause. Is this the witness, friar?</div>
                              <div class="line">First, let her show her face, and after speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon, my lord; I will not show my face</div>
                              <div class="line">Until my husband bid me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you married?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you a maid?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A widow, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, you are nothing then: neither maid, widow, nor wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, she may be a punk; for many of them are</div>
                              <div class="line">neither maid, widow, nor wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Silence that fellow: I would he had some cause</div>
                              <div class="line">To prattle for himself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord; I do confess I ne'er was married;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I confess besides I am no maid:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have known my husband; yet my husband</div>
                              <div class="line">Knows not that ever he knew me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He was drunk then, my lord: it can be no better.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">For the benefit of silence, would thou wert so too!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is no witness for Lord Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Now I come to't my lord</div>
                              <div class="line">She that accuses him of fornication,</div>
                              <div class="line">In self-same manner doth accuse my husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">And charges him my lord, with such a time</div>
                              <div class="line">When I'll depose I had him in mine arms</div>
                              <div class="line">With all the effect of love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">Charges she more than me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Not that I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No? you say your husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, just, my lord, and that is Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who thinks he knows that he ne'er knew my body,</div>
                              <div class="line">But knows he thinks that he knows Isabel's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a strange abuse. Let's see thy face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband bids me; now I will unmask.</div>
                              <p>Unveiling</p>
                              <div class="line">This is that face, thou cruel Angelo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which once thou sworest was worth the looking on;</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the hand which, with a vow'd contract,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was fast belock'd in thine; this is the body</div>
                              <div class="line">That took away the match from Isabel,</div>
                              <div class="line">And did supply thee at thy garden-house</div>
                              <div class="line">In her imagined person.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Know you this woman?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Carnally, she says.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, no more!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Enough, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I must confess I know this woman:</div>
                              <div class="line">And five years since there was some speech of marriage</div>
                              <div class="line">Betwixt myself and her; which was broke off,</div>
                              <div class="line">Partly for that her promised proportions</div>
                              <div class="line">Came short of composition, but in chief</div>
                              <div class="line">For that her reputation was disvalued</div>
                              <div class="line">In levity: since which time of five years</div>
                              <div class="line">I never spake with her, saw her, nor heard from her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my faith and honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MARIANA</div>
                              <div class="line">Noble prince,</div>
                              <div class="line">As there comes light from heaven and words from breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">As there is sense in truth and truth in virtue,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am affianced this man's wife as strongly</div>
                              <div class="line">As words could make up vows: and, my good lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">But Tuesday night last gone in's garden-house</div>
                              <div class="line">He knew me as a wife. As this is true,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me in safety raise me from my knees</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else for ever be confixed here,</div>
                              <div class="line">A marble monument!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ANGELO</div>
                              <div class="line">I did but smile till now:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, good my lord, give me the scope of justice</div>
                              <div class="line">My patience here is touch'd. I do perceive</div>
                              <div class="line">These poor informal women are no more</div>
                              <div class="line">But instruments of some more mightier member</div>
                              <div class="line">That sets them on: let me have way, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">To find this practise out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">And punish them to your height of pleasure.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou foolish friar, and thou pernicious woman,</div>
                              <div class="line">Compact with her that's gone, think'st thou thy oaths,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though they would swear down each particular saint,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were testimonies against his worth and credit</div>
                              <div class="line">That's seal'd in approbation? You, Lord Escalus,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sit with my cousin; lend him your kind pains</div>
                              <div class="line">To find out this abuse, whence 'tis derived.</div>
                              <div class="line">There is another friar that set them on;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him be sent for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">FRIAR PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">Would he were here, my lord! for he indeed</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath set the women on to this complaint:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your provost knows the place where he abides</div>
                              <div class="line">And he may fetch him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE VINCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go do it instantly.</div>
                              <p>Exit Provost</p>
                              <div class="line">And you, my noble and well-warranted cousin,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom it concerns to hear this matter forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do with your injuries as seems you best,</div>
                              <div class="line">In any chastisement: I for a while will leave you;</div>
                              <div class="line">But stir not you till you have well determined</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon these slanderers.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, we'll do it throughly.</div>
                              <p>Exit DUKE</p>
                              <div class="line">Signior Lucio, did not you say you knew that</div>
                              <div class="line">Friar Lodowick to be a dishonest person?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Cucullus non facit monachum:' honest in nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">but in his clothes; and one that hath spoke most</div>
                              <div class="line">villanous speeches of the duke.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">We shall entreat you to abide here till he come and</div>
                              <div class="line">enforce them against him: we shall find this friar a</div>
                              <div class="line">notable fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">As any in Vienna, on my word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Call that same Isabel here once again; I would speak with her.</div>
                              <p>Exit an Attendant</p>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, my lord, give me leave to question; you</div>
                              <div class="line">shall see how I'll handle her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not better than he, by her own report.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, I think, if you handled her privately,</div>
                              <div class="line">she would sooner confess: perchance, publicly,</div>
                              <div class="line">she'll be ashamed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">I will go darkly to work with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's the way; for women are light at midnight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Officers with ISABELLA; and Provost with
the DUKE VINCENTIO in his friar's habit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, mistress: here's a gentlewoman denies all</div>
                              <div class="line">that you have said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, here comes the rascal I spoke of; here with</div>
                              <div class="line">the provost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">ESCALUS</div>
